Workspace: The errors you're encountering are due to TypeScript not being able to infer the types of your [`income`](command:_github.copilot.openSymbolFromReferences?%5B%22%22%2C%5B%7B%22uri%22%3A%7B%22scheme%22%3A%22file%22%2C%22authority%22%3A%22%22%2C%22path%22%3A%22%2FUsers%2Fjuleseulalie%2Fthe-budget-app%2Fclient%2Fsrc%2FApp.tsx%22%2C%22query%22%3A%22%22%2C%22fragment%22%3A%22%22%7D%2C%22pos%22%3A%7B%22line%22%3A7%2C%22character%22%3A9%7D%7D%5D%2C%22f8f99d72-d125-4bfd-9e99-e61e60a5bdc8%22%5D "Go to definition") and [`expenses`](command:_github.copilot.openSymbolFromReferences?%5B%22%22%2C%5B%7B%22uri%22%3A%7B%22scheme%22%3A%22file%22%2C%22authority%22%3A%22%22%2C%22path%22%3A%22%2FUsers%2Fjuleseulalie%2Fthe-budget-app%2Fclient%2Fsrc%2FApp.tsx%22%2C%22query%22%3A%22%22%2C%22fragment%22%3A%22%22%7D%2C%22pos%22%3A%7B%22line%22%3A8%2C%22character%22%3A9%7D%7D%5D%2C%22f8f99d72-d125-4bfd-9e99-e61e60a5bdc8%22%5D "Go to definition") state arrays. By default, TypeScript infers the type of an empty array as `never[]`, which means it doesn't know what type of objects the array will hold.

To fix this, you need to explicitly define the types for your state variables. Here's how you can do it:

1. Define interfaces for your income and expense items.
2. Use these interfaces to type your state variables.

Here's the updated code:

```tsx
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Trash2, Search, Download, Moon } from 'lucide-react';
import { PieChart, Pie, Cell, Legend, Tooltip } from 'recharts';

interface IncomeItem {
  description: string;
  amount: number;
}

interface ExpenseItem {
  description: string;
  amount: number;
  date: string;
}

const BudgetApp: React.FC = () => {
  const [incomeCategories, setIncomeCategories] = useState<string[]>(['Salaire net', 'Freelance', 'Investissements']);
  const [expenseCategories, setExpenseCategories] = useState<string[]>(['Loyer', 'Courses', 'Transport', 'Loisirs', 'Santé']);
  const [income, setIncome] = useState<IncomeItem[]>([]);
  const [expenses, setExpenses] = useState<ExpenseItem[]>([]);
  const [newIncome, setNewIncome] = useState<{ description: string; amount: string }>({ description: '', amount: '' });
  const [newExpense, setNewExpense] = useState<{ description: string; amount: string; date: string }>({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
  const [newCategory, setNewCategory] = useState<string>('');

  const totalIncome = income.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.amount, 0);
  const totalExpenses = expenses.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.amount, 0);
  const remainingMoney = totalIncome - totalExpenses;

  const handleAddIncome = () => {
    if (newIncome.description && newIncome.amount) {
      setIncome([...income, { ...newIncome, amount: Number(newIncome.amount) }]);
      setNewIncome({ description: '', amount: '' });
    }
  };

  const handleAddExpense = () => {
    if (newExpense.description && newExpense.amount && newExpense.date) {
      setExpenses([...expenses, { ...newExpense, amount: Number(newExpense.amount) }]);
      setNewExpense({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
    }
  };

  const handleDeleteIncome = (index: number) => {
    setIncome(income.filter((_, i) => i !== index));
  };

  const handleDeleteExpense = (index: number) => {
    setExpenses(expenses.filter((_, i) => i !== index));
  };

  const handleAddCategory = (type: 'income' | 'expense') => {
    if (newCategory) {
      if (type === 'income') {
        setIncomeCategories([...incomeCategories, newCategory]);
      } else {
        setExpenseCategories([...expenseCategories, newCategory]);
      }
      setNewCategory('');
    }
  };

  const pieChartData = expenses.map(expense => ({
    name: expense.description,
    value: expense.amount
  }));

  const COLORS = ['#0088FE', '#00C49F', '#FFBB28', '#FF8042', '#8884d8', '#82ca9d'];

  return (
    <div className="bg-gray-100 min-h-screen">
      <header className="bg-indigo-600 text-white p-4 flex justify-between items-center">
        <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold">Budget App</h1>
        <Moon className="cursor-pointer" />
      </header>

      <main className="container mx-auto p-4">
        <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4 mb-4">
          <div className="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow">
            <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Entrées d'argent</h2>
            <div className="flex mb-2">
              <select 
                className="flex-grow mr-2 p-2 border rounded"
                value={newIncome.description}
                onChange={(e) => setNewIncome({ ...newIncome, description: e.target.value })}
              >
                <option value="">Sélectionner une catégorie</option>
                {incomeCategories.map((cat, index) => (
                  <option key={index} value={cat}>{cat}</option>
                ))}
              </select>
              <input
                type="text"
                placeholder="Montant"
                className="w-24 mr-2 p-2 border rounded"
                value={newIncome.amount}
                onChange={(e) => setNewIncome({ ...newIncome, amount: e.target.value })}
              />
              <button
                className="bg-indigo-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded"
                onClick={handleAddIncome}
              >
                + Ajouter
              </button>
            </div>
            <div className="flex mb-2">
              <input
                type="text"
                placeholder="Nouvelle catégorie"
                className="flex-grow mr-2 p-2 border rounded"
                value={newCategory}
                onChange={(e) => setNewCategory(e.target.value)}
              />
              <button
                className="bg-green-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded"
                onClick={() => handleAddCategory('income')}
              >
                + Catégorie
              </button>
            </div>
            {income.map((item, index) => (
              <div key={index} className="flex justify-between items-center mt-2">
                <span>{item.description}: {item.amount} €</span>
                <Trash2
                  className="text-red-500 cursor-pointer"
                  onClick={() => handleDeleteIncome(index)}
                />
              </div>
            ))}
            <div className="mt-4 font-semibold">
              Total des entrées: {totalIncome.toFixed(2)} €
            </div>
          </div>

          <div className="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow">
            <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Ajouter une dépense</h2>
            <div className="flex mb-2">
              <select
                className="flex-grow mr-2 p-2 border rounded"
                value={newExpense.description}
                onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({ ...newExpense, description: e.target.value })}
              >
                <option value="">Sélectionner une catégorie</option>
                {expenseCategories.map((cat, index) => (
                  <option key={index} value={cat}>{cat}</option>
                ))}
              </select>
              <input
                type="text"
                placeholder="Montant"
                className="w-24 mr-2 p-2 border rounded"
                value={newExpense.amount}
                onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({ ...newExpense, amount: e.target.value })}
              />
              <input
                type="date"
                className="w-32 mr-2 p-2 border rounded"
                value={newExpense.date}
                onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({ ...newExpense, date: e.target.value })}
              />
              <button
                className="bg-indigo-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded"
                onClick={handleAddExpense}
              >
                + Ajouter
              </button>
            </div>
            <div className="flex mb-2">
              <input
                type="text"
                placeholder="Nouvelle catégorie"
                className="flex-grow mr-2 p-2 border rounded"
                value={newCategory}
                onChange={(e) => setNewCategory(e.target.value)}
              />
              <button
                className="bg-green-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded"
                onClick={() => handleAddCategory('expense')}
              >
                + Catégorie
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div className="bg-green-100 p-4 rounded-lg shadow mb-4">
          <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold">Argent restant: {remainingMoney.toFixed(2)} €</h2>
        </div>

        <div className="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow mb-4">
          <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Sorties d'argent</h2>
          <div className="relative mb-4">
            <Search className="absolute left-3 top-3 text-gray-400" />
            <input
              type="text"
              placeholder="Rechercher des dépenses..."
              className="w-full p-2 pl-10 border rounded"
            />
          </div>
          {expenses.map((expense, index) => (
            <div key={index} className="flex justify-between items-center mb-2">
              <div>
                <div className="font-semibold">{expense.description}</div>
                <div className="text-sm text-gray-500">{expense.date}</div>
              </div>
              <div className="flex items-center">
                <span className="mr-2">{expense.amount} €</span>
                <Trash2
                  className="text-red-500 cursor-pointer"
                  onClick={() => handleDeleteExpense(index)}
                />
              </div>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>

        <div className="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow">
          <div className="flex justify-between items-center mb-4">
            <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold">Répartition des dépenses</h2>
            <Download className="text-green-500 cursor-pointer" />
          </div>
          <select className="w-full p-2 mb-4 border rounded">
            <option>Pie chart</option>
          </select>
          <PieChart width={400} height={400}>
            <Pie
              data={pieChartData}
              cx={200}
              cy={200}
              labelLine={false}
              outerRadius={80}
              fill="#8884d8"
              dataKey="value"
            >
              {pieChartData.map((entry, index) => (
                <Cell key={`cell-${index}`} fill={COLORS[index % COLORS.length]} />
              ))}
            </Pie>
            <Tooltip />
            <Legend />
          </PieChart>
        </div>
      </main>
    </div>
  );
};

export default BudgetApp;
```

By defining the `IncomeItem` and `ExpenseItem` interfaces and using them to type the [`income`](command:_github.copilot.openSymbolFromReferences?%5B%22%22%2C%5B%7B%22uri%22%3A%7B%22scheme%22%3A%22file%22%2C%22authority%22%3A%22%22%2C%22path%22%3A%22%2FUsers%2Fjuleseulalie%2Fthe-budget-app%2Fclient%2Fsrc%2FApp.tsx%22%2C%22query%22%3A%22%22%2C%22fragment%22%3A%22%22%7D%2C%22pos%22%3A%7B%22line%22%3A7%2C%22character%22%3A9%7D%7D%5D%2C%22f8f99d72-d125-4bfd-9e99-e61e60a5bdc8%22%5D "Go to definition") and [`expenses`](command:_github.copilot.openSymbolFromReferences?%5B%22%22%2C%5B%7B%22uri%22%3A%7B%22scheme%22%3A%22file%22%2C%22authority%22%3A%22%22%2C%22path%22%3A%22%2FUsers%2Fjuleseulalie%2Fthe-budget-app%2Fclient%2Fsrc%2FApp.tsx%22%2C%22query%22%3A%22%22%2C%22fragment%22%3A%22%22%7D%2C%22pos%22%3A%7B%22line%22%3A8%2C%22character%22%3A9%7D%7D%5D%2C%22f8f99d72-d125-4bfd-9e99-e61e60a5bdc8%22%5D "Go to definition") state variables, TypeScript will now understand the structure of the objects in these arrays, and the errors should be resolved.

Workspace: To ensure that top-level permissions are not set to write-all, you need to explicitly set the permissions in your GitHub Actions workflow. Here's the updated [`gh-pages.yml`](command:_github.copilot.openRelativePath?%5B%7B%22scheme%22%3A%22file%22%2C%22authority%22%3A%22%22%2C%22path%22%3A%22%2FUsers%2Fjuleseulalie%2Fthe-budget-app%2F.github%2Fworkflows%2Fgh-pages.yml%22%2C%22query%22%3A%22%22%2C%22fragment%22%3A%22%22%7D%2C%221f3563c8-b7a2-4fac-b218-efbe70bd28a7%22%5D "/Users/juleseulalie/the-budget-app/.github/workflows/gh-pages.yml") file with the appropriate permissions:

```github-actions-workflow
name: GitHub Pages deploy

on:
  push:
    branches: [main]

permissions:
  contents: read

jobs:
  build-and-deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout 🛎️
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Use Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v3

          node-version: '20'

      - name: Install and Build 🔧

          cd client
          npm ci
          npm run build

      - name: Deploy 🚀
        uses: JamesIves/github-pages-deploy-action@v4

          branch: gh-pages
          folder: client/build
```

This configuration ensures that the workflow has the necessary permissions without granting excessive write permissions.

Devfront-end: i want to create a new branch, please provide clear, detailed steps

GitHub Copilot: Sure, here are the detailed steps to create a new branch in Git:

1. **Open Terminal**: On your Mac, open the Terminal application.

2. **Navigate to Your Project Directory**: Use the `cd` command to navigate to the directory of your project. For example:
   ```sh
   cd path/to/your/project
   ```

3. **Fetch the Latest Changes**: Ensure your local repository is up-to-date with the remote repository.
   ```sh
   git fetch origin
   ```

4. **Create a New Branch**: Use the `git checkout` command with the `-b` option to create and switch to a new branch. Replace `new-branch-name` with your desired branch name.
   ```sh
   git checkout -b new-branch-name
   ```

5. **Push the New Branch to Remote**: Push the new branch to the remote repository.
   ```sh
   git push -u origin new-branch-name
   ```

### Example
If you want to create a branch named `feature/new-feature`, you would run:
```sh
cd path/to/your/project
git fetch origin
git checkout -b feature/new-feature
git push -u origin feature/new-feature
```

This will create a new branch named `feature/new-feature`, switch to it, and push it to the remote repository.

Devfront-end: before push , iwant to rename the branch just created

GitHub Copilot: To rename a branch in Git, you can use the `git branch -m` command. Here are the detailed steps:

1. **Open Terminal**: On your Mac, open the Terminal application.

2. **Navigate to Your Project Directory**: Use the `cd` command to navigate to the directory of your project. For example:
   ```sh
   cd path/to/your/project
   ```

3. **Create a New Branch**: Use the `git checkout` command with the `-b` option to create and switch to a new branch. Replace `old-branch-name` with your desired branch name.
   ```sh
   git checkout -b old-branch-name
   ```

4. **Rename the Branch**: Use the `git branch -m` command to rename the branch. Replace `new-branch-name` with the new branch name you want.
   ```sh
   git branch -m new-branch-name
   ```

5. **Push the Renamed Branch to Remote**: Push the renamed branch to the remote repository.
   ```sh
   git push -u origin new-branch-name
   ```

6. **Delete the Old Branch on Remote (Optional)**: If the old branch was pushed to the remote repository, you might want to delete it.
   ```sh
   git push origin --delete old-branch-name
   ```

### Example
If you want to create a branch named `feature/old-feature`, rename it to `feature/new-feature`, and then push it to the remote repository, you would run:
```sh
cd path/to/your/project
git checkout -b feature/old-feature
git branch -m feature/new-feature
git push -u origin feature/new-feature
git push origin --delete feature/old-feature
```

This will create a new branch named `feature/old-feature`, rename it to `feature/new-feature`, push the renamed branch to the remote repository, and delete the old branch from the remote repository.

1. **Open Terminal**: On your Mac, open the Terminal application.

2. **Navigate to Your Project Directory**: Use the `cd` command to navigate to the directory of your project. For example:
   ```sh
   cd path/to/your/project
   ```

3. **List All Local Branches**: Use the `git branch` command to list all local branches.
   ```sh
   git branch
   ```

4. **List All Remote Branches**: Use the `git branch -r` command to list all remote branches.
   ```sh
   git branch -r
   ```

5. **List All Local and Remote Branches**: Use the `git branch -a` command to list all local and remote branches.
   ```sh
   git branch -a
   ```

### Example
```sh
cd path/to/your/project
git branch       # Lists all local branches
git branch -r    # Lists all remote branches
git branch -a    # Lists all local and remote branches
```

These commands will help you see all the branches available in your repository.

Devfront-end: how to switch

GitHub Copilot: To switch to a different branch in Git, you can use the `git checkout` command. Here are the detailed steps:

1. **Open Terminal**: On your Mac, open the Terminal application.

2. **Navigate to Your Project Directory**: Use the `cd` command to navigate to the directory of your project. For example:
   ```sh
   cd path/to/your/project
   ```

3. **List All Branches**: Optionally, you can list all branches to see the available branches.
   ```sh
   git branch -a
   ```

4. **Switch to the Desired Branch**: Use the `git checkout` command followed by the branch name you want to switch to. Replace `branch-name` with the name of the branch you want to switch to.
   ```sh
   git checkout branch-name
   ```

### Example
If you want to switch to a branch named `feature/new-feature`, you would run:
```sh
cd path/to/your/project
git branch -a       # Optional: Lists all branches
git checkout feature/new-feature
```

This will switch your working directory to the specified branch. If the branch does not exist locally, you may need to fetch it from the remote repository first:
```sh
git fetch origin
git checkout feature/new-feature
```

Devfront-end: how can i make sure that the changes that i make will go the new branch ? 

GitHub Copilot: To ensure that the changes you make will go to the new branch, you need to switch to the new branch before making any changes. Here are the steps to follow:

1. **Open Terminal**: On your Mac, open the Terminal application.

2. **Navigate to Your Project Directory**: Use the `cd` command to navigate to the directory of your project. For example:
   ```sh
   cd path/to/your/project
   ```

3. **Create and Switch to the New Branch**: If you haven't already created the new branch, you can do so and switch to it using:
   ```sh
   git checkout -b new-branch-name
   ```

4. **Verify the Current Branch**: Use the `git branch` command to verify that you are on the correct branch. The current branch will be highlighted with an asterisk (`*`).
   ```sh
   git branch
   ```

5. **Make Your Changes**: Open your project in your code editor (e.g., Visual Studio Code) and make the necessary changes. For example, you can edit the [`App.tsx`](command:_github.copilot.openRelativePath?%5B%7B%22scheme%22%3A%22file%22%2C%22authority%22%3A%22%22%2C%22path%22%3A%22%2FUsers%2Fjuleseulalie%2Fthe-budget-app%2Fclient%2Fsrc%2FApp.tsx%22%2C%22query%22%3A%22%22%2C%22fragment%22%3A%22%22%7D%2C%229eef2827-2201-4b0e-bc7c-040506e9ee5f%22%5D "/Users/juleseulalie/the-budget-app/client/src/App.tsx") file.

6. **Stage and Commit Your Changes**: After making your changes, stage and commit them to the new branch.
   ```sh
   git add .
   git commit -m "Your commit message"
   ```

7. **Push the New Branch to Remote**: Push the new branch to the remote repository.
   ```sh
   git push -u origin new-branch-name
   ```

### Example
If you want to create a branch named `feature/new-feature` and ensure your changes go to this branch, you would run:
```sh
cd path/to/your/project
git checkout -b feature/new-feature
git branch       # Verify you are on 'feature/new-feature'
# Make your changes in the code editor
git add .
git commit -m "Your commit message"
git push -u origin feature/new-feature
```

By following these steps, you can ensure that all changes you make will be committed to the new branch.

GitHub Copilot: The errors you're seeing are related to browser extensions and not directly to your React application. These errors typically occur when browser extensions (such as ad blockers, React DevTools, or other development tools) try to communicate with their background scripts but fail due to various reasons. Here's a breakdown of the common errors:

1. **Uncaught (in promise) Error: Could not establish connection. Receiving end does not exist.**
   - This error indicates that a browser extension is trying to send a message to its background script, but the background script is not available or not responding.

2. **Unchecked runtime.lastError: The page keeping the extension port is moved into back/forward cache, so the message channel is closed.**
   - This error occurs when the page is moved into the back/forward cache (bfcache), causing the message channel used by the extension to close unexpectedly.

3. **Download the React DevTools for a better development experience: https://reactjs.org/link/react-devtools**
   - This is an informational message from React suggesting you download the React DevTools extension for a better development experience.

4. **Uncaught (in promise) Error: A listener indicated an asynchronous response by returning true, but the message channel closed before a response was received.**
   - This error occurs when an extension's message listener returns `true` to indicate an asynchronous response, but the message channel is closed before the response is sent.

### How to Address These Errors

1. **Ignore Extension Errors**: These errors are not related to your application code and can be safely ignored. They are caused by browser extensions and do not affect the functionality of your app.

2. **Disable Extensions**: If the errors are distracting, you can try disabling browser extensions one by one to identify which one is causing the issue. Once identified, you can either keep it disabled or look for an update/fix for the extension.

3. **Use Incognito Mode**: Open your application in an incognito window where extensions are typically disabled by default. This can help you verify that the errors are indeed caused by extensions.

4. **Check for Extension Updates**: Ensure that all your browser extensions are up-to-date. Sometimes, updating the extensions can resolve these issues.

### Example of Disabling Extensions in Chrome

1. **Open Chrome**: Open your Chrome browser.
2. **Go to Extensions Page**: Type `chrome://extensions/` in the address bar and press Enter.
3. **Disable Extensions**: Toggle off the extensions one by one to identify the problematic one.

By following these steps, you can manage and mitigate the errors caused by browser extensions. These errors do not indicate any issues with your React application itself.

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Trash2, Download, Sun, Moon } from 'lucide-react';
import { PieChart, Pie, Cell, Legend, Tooltip, BarChart, Bar, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, LineChart, Line } from 'recharts';

interface IncomeItem {
  description: string;
  amount: number;
}

interface ExpenseItem {
  description: string;
  amount: number;
  date: string;
}

const BudgetApp: React.FC = () => {
  const [incomeCategories, setIncomeCategories] = useState<string[]>(['Salaire net', 'Freelance', 'Investissements']);
  const [expenseCategories, setExpenseCategories] = useState<string[]>(['Loyer', 'Courses', 'Transport', 'Loisirs', 'Santé']);
  const [income, setIncome] = useState<IncomeItem[]>([]);
  const [expenses, setExpenses] = useState<ExpenseItem[]>([]);
  const [newIncome, setNewIncome] = useState<{ description: string; amount: string }>({ description: '', amount: '' });
  const [newExpense, setNewExpense] = useState<{ description: string; amount: string; date: string }>({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
  const [newCategory, setNewCategory] = useState<string>('');
  const [chartType, setChartType] = useState<string>('pie');
  const [isDarkTheme, setIsDarkTheme] = useState<boolean>(false);

  const totalIncome = income.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.amount, 0);
  const totalExpenses = expenses.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.amount, 0);
  const remainingMoney = totalIncome - totalExpenses;

  const handleAddIncome = () => {
    if (newIncome.description && newIncome.amount) {
      setIncome([...income, { ...newIncome, amount: Number(newIncome.amount) }]);
      setNewIncome({ description: '', amount: '' });
    }
  };

  const handleAddExpense = () => {
    if (newExpense.description && newExpense.amount && newExpense.date) {
      setExpenses([...expenses, { ...newExpense, amount: Number(newExpense.amount) }]);
      setNewExpense({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
    }
  };

  const handleDeleteIncome = (index: number) => {
    setIncome(income.filter((_, i) => i !== index));
  };

  const handleDeleteExpense = (index: number) => {
    setExpenses(expenses.filter((_, i) => i !== index));
  };

  const handleAddCategory = (type: 'income' | 'expense') => {
    if (newCategory) {
      if (type === 'income') {
        setIncomeCategories([...incomeCategories, newCategory]);
      } else {
        setExpenseCategories([...expenseCategories, newCategory]);
      }
      setNewCategory('');
    }
  };

  const toggleTheme = () => {
    setIsDarkTheme(!isDarkTheme);
  };

  const chartData = expenses.map(expense => ({
    name: expense.description,
    value: expense.amount
  }));

  const COLORS = ['#0088FE', '#00C49F', '#FFBB28', '#FF8042', '#8884d8', '#82ca9d'];

  const renderChart = () => {
    switch (chartType) {
      case 'pie':
        return (
          <PieChart width={400} height={300}>
            <Pie
              data={chartData}
              cx={200}
              cy={150}
              labelLine={false}
              outerRadius={80}
              fill="#8884d8"
              dataKey="value"
            >
              {chartData.map((entry, index) => (
                <Cell key={`cell-${index}`} fill={COLORS[index % COLORS.length]} />
              ))}
            </Pie>
            <Tooltip />
            <Legend />
          </PieChart>
        );
      case 'bar':
        return (
          <BarChart width={400} height={300} data={chartData}>
            <CartesianGrid strokeDasharray="3 3" />
            <XAxis dataKey="name" />
            <YAxis />
            <Tooltip />
            <Legend />
            <Bar dataKey="value" fill="#8884d8" />
          </BarChart>
        );
      case 'line':
        return (
          <LineChart width={400} height={300} data={chartData}>
            <CartesianGrid strokeDasharray="3 3" />
            <XAxis dataKey="name" />
            <YAxis />
            <Tooltip />
            <Legend />
            <Line type="monotone" dataKey="value" stroke="#8884d8" />
          </LineChart>
        );
      default:
        return null;
    }
  };

  const themeClasses = isDarkTheme
    ? {
        body: "bg-gray-900 text-white",
        header: "bg-indigo-800",
        card: "bg-gray-800",
        input: "bg-gray-700 text-white",
        button: "bg-indigo-600 hover:bg-indigo-700",
        incomeText: "text-green-400",
        expenseText: "text-red-400",
        balanceCard: "bg-gray-700",
      }
    : {
        body: "bg-gray-100 text-gray-900",
        header: "bg-indigo-600",
        card: "bg-white",
        input: "bg-white text-gray-900 border border-gray-300",
        button: "bg-indigo-600 hover:bg-indigo-700",
        incomeText: "text-green-600",
        expenseText: "text-red-600",
        balanceCard: "bg-green-100",
      };

  return (
    <div className={`${themeClasses.body} min-h-screen`}>
      <header className={`${themeClasses.header} text-white p-4 flex justify-between items-center`}>
        <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold">Budget Owl</h1>
        {isDarkTheme ? (
          <Sun className="cursor-pointer" onClick={toggleTheme} />
        ) : (
          <Moon className="cursor-pointer" onClick={toggleTheme} />
        )}
      </header>

      <main className="container mx-auto p-4">
        <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4 mb-4">
          <div className={`${themeClasses.card} p-4 rounded-lg shadow`}>
            <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Entrées d'argent</h2>
            <div className="flex flex-wrap mb-2">
              <select 
                className={`${themeClasses.input} flex-grow mr-2 p-2 rounded mb-2 sm:mb-0`}
                value={newIncome.description}
                onChange={(e) => setNewIncome({ ...newIncome, description: e.target.value })}
              >
                <option value="">Sélectionner une catégorie</option>
                {incomeCategories.map((cat, index) => (
                  <option key={index} value={cat}>{cat}</option>
                ))}
              </select>
              <input
                type="text"
                placeholder="Montant"
                className={`${themeClasses.input} w-full sm:w-24 mr-2 p-2 rounded mb-2 sm:mb-0`}
                value={newIncome.amount}
                onChange={(e) => setNewIncome({ ...newIncome, amount: e.target.value })}
              />
              <button
                className={`${themeClasses.button} w-full sm:w-auto text-white px-4 py-2 rounded`}
                onClick={handleAddIncome}
              >
                + Ajouter
              </button>
            </div>
            <div className="flex mb-2">
              <input
                type="text"
                placeholder="Nouvelle catégorie"
                className={`${themeClasses.input} flex-grow mr-2 p-2 rounded`}
                value={newCategory}
                onChange={(e) => setNewCategory(e.target.value)}
              />
              <button
                className="bg-green-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded"
                onClick={() => handleAddCategory('income')}
              >
                + Catégorie
              </button>
            </div>
            {income.map((item, index) => (
              <div key={index} className="flex justify-between items-center mt-2">
                <span>{item.description}: <span className={themeClasses.incomeText}>{item.amount} €</span></span>
                <Trash2
                  className="text-red-500 cursor-pointer"
                  onClick={() => handleDeleteIncome(index)}
                />
              </div>
            ))}
            <div className="mt-4 font-semibold">
              Total des entrées: <span className={themeClasses.incomeText}>{totalIncome.toFixed(2)} €</span>
            </div>
          </div>

          <div className={`${themeClasses.card} p-4 rounded-lg shadow`}>
            <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Dépenses</h2>
            <div className="flex flex-wrap mb-2">
              <select
                className={`${themeClasses.input} flex-grow mr-2 p-2 rounded mb-2 sm:mb-0`}
                value={newExpense.description}
                onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({ ...newExpense, description: e.target.value })}
              >
                <option value="">Sélectionner une catégorie</option>
                {expenseCategories.map((cat, index) => (
                  <option key={index} value={cat}>{cat}</option>
                ))}
              </select>
              <input
                type="text"
                placeholder="Montant"
                className={`${themeClasses.input} w-full sm:w-24 mr-2 p-2 rounded mb-2 sm:mb-0`}
                value={newExpense.amount}
                onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({ ...newExpense, amount: e.target.value })}
              />
              <input
                type="date"
                className={`${themeClasses.input} w-full sm:w-32 mr-2 p-2 rounded mb-2 sm:mb-0`}
                value={newExpense.date}
                onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({ ...newExpense, date: e.target.value })}
              />
              <button
                className={`${themeClasses.button} w-full sm:w-auto text-white px-4 py-2 rounded`}
                onClick={handleAddExpense}
              >
                + Ajouter
              </button>
            </div>
            <div className="flex mb-2">
              <input
                type="text"
                placeholder="Nouvelle catégorie"
                className={`${themeClasses.input} flex-grow mr-2 p-2 rounded`}
                value={newCategory}
                onChange={(e) => setNewCategory(e.target.value)}
              />
              <button
                className="bg-green-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded"
                onClick={() => handleAddCategory('expense')}
              >
                + Catégorie
              </button>
            </div>
            {expenses.map((expense, index) => (
              <div key={index} className="flex justify-between items-center mb-2">
                <div>
                  <div className="font-semibold">{expense.description}</div>
                  <div className="text-sm opacity-75">{expense.date}</div>
                </div>
                <div className="flex items-center">
                  <span className={`mr-2 ${themeClasses.expenseText}`}>{expense.amount} €</span>
                  <Trash2
                    className="text-red-500 cursor-pointer"
                    onClick={() => handleDeleteExpense(index)}
                  />
                </div>
              </div>
            ))}
            <div className="mt-4 font-semibold">
              Total des dépenses: <span className={themeClasses.expenseText}>{totalExpenses.toFixed(2)} €</span>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div className={`${themeClasses.balanceCard} p-4 rounded-lg shadow mb-4`}>
          <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold">Budget Summary</h2>
          <div className="grid grid-cols-3 gap-4 mt-2">
            <div>
              <div className="text-sm opacity-75">Total Income</div>
              <div className={`text-lg font-bold ${themeClasses.incomeText}`}>{totalIncome.toFixed(2)} €</div>
            </div>
            <div>
              <div className="text-sm opacity-75">Total Expenses</div>
              <div className={`text-lg font-bold ${themeClasses.expenseText}`}>{totalExpenses.toFixed(2)} €</div>
            </div>
            <div>
              <div className="text-sm opacity-75">Balance</div>
              <div className={`text-lg font-bold ${remainingMoney >= 0 ? themeClasses.incomeText : themeClasses.expenseText}`}>
                {remainingMoney.toFixed(2)} €
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div className={`${themeClasses.card} p-4 rounded-lg shadow`}>
          <div className="flex justify-between items-center mb-4">
            <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold">Répartition des dépenses</h2>
            <Download className="text-green-500 cursor-pointer" />
          </div>
          <select 
            className={`${themeClasses.input} w-full p-2 mb-4 rounded`}
            value={chartType}
            onChange={(e) => setChartType(e.target.value)}
          >
            <option value="pie">Pie chart</option>
            <option value="bar">Bar chart</option>
            <option value="line">Line chart</option>
          </select>
          <div className="w-full overflow-x-auto">
            {renderChart()}
          </div>
        </div>
      </main>
    </div>
  );
};

export default BudgetApp;

  };

        setExpenseCategories([...expenseCategories, newCategory]);
      }
      setNewCategory('');

  const chartData = expenses.map(expense => ({

  }));

            </Pie>
            <Tooltip />
            <Legend />
          </PieChart>
        );
      case 'bar':
        return (
          <BarChart width={400} height={300} data={chartData}>
            <CartesianGrid strokeDasharray="3 3" />
            <XAxis dataKey="name" />
            <YAxis />
            <Tooltip />
            <Legend />
            <Bar dataKey="value" fill="#8884d8" />
          </BarChart>
        );
      case 'line':
        return (
          <LineChart width={400} height={300} data={chartData}>
            <CartesianGrid strokeDasharray="3 3" />
            <XAxis dataKey="name" />
            <YAxis />
            <Tooltip />
            <Legend />
            <Line type="monotone" dataKey="value" stroke="#8884d8" />
          </LineChart>
        );
      default:
        return null;
    }

### CSS for Shaking Animation
Add the following CSS to your stylesheet to create the shaking animation for the money bag emoji:

```css
.shaking-emoji {
  display: inline-block;
  animation: shake 0.82s cubic-bezier(.36,.07,.19,.97) both infinite;
  transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
  backface-visibility: hidden;
  perspective: 1000px;
}

@keyframes shake {
  10%, 90% {
    transform: translate3d(-1px, 0, 0);
  }

  20%, 80% {
    transform: translate3d(2px, 0, 0);
  }

  30%, 50%, 70% {
    transform: translate3d(-4px, 0, 0);
  }

              >

        <div className={`${themeClasses.card} p-4 rounded-lg shadow`}>

            <option value="pie">Pie chart</option>
            <option value="bar">Bar chart</option>

          </select>
          <div className="w-full overflow-x-auto">
            {renderChart()}
          </div>
        </div>
      </main>
    </div>
  );
};

export default BudgetApp;

interface IncomeItem {
  description: string;
  amount: number;
}

interface ExpenseItem {
  description: string;
  amount: number;
  date: string;
}

const BudgetApp: React.FC = () => {
  const [incomeCategories, setIncomeCategories] = useState<string[]>(['Salaire net', 'Freelance', 'Investissements']);
  const [expenseCategories, setExpenseCategories] = useState<string[]>(['Loyer', 'Courses', 'Transport', 'Loisirs', 'Santé']);
  const [income, setIncome] = useState<IncomeItem[]>([]);
  const [expenses, setExpenses] = useState<ExpenseItem[]>([]);
  const [newIncome, setNewIncome] = useState<{ description: string; amount: string }>({ description: '', amount: '' });
  const [newExpense, setNewExpense] = useState<{ description: string; amount: string; date: string }>({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
  const [newCategory, setNewCategory] = useState<string>('');
  const [chartType, setChartType] = useState<string>('pie');
  const [isDarkTheme, setIsDarkTheme] = useState<boolean>(false);

  const themeClasses = isDarkTheme ? 'dark' : 'light';

  const toggleTheme = () => {
    setIsDarkTheme(!isDarkTheme);
  };

  const totalIncome = income.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.amount, 0);
  const totalExpenses = expenses.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.amount, 0);
  const remainingMoney = totalIncome - totalExpenses;

  const handleAddIncome = () => {
    if (newIncome.description && newIncome.amount) {
      setIncome([...income, { ...newIncome, amount: Number(newIncome.amount) }]);
      setNewIncome({ description: '', amount: '' });
    }
  };

  const handleAddExpense = () => {
    if (newExpense.description && newExpense.amount && newExpense.date) {
      setExpenses([...expenses, { ...newExpense, amount: Number(newExpense.amount) }]);
      setNewExpense({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
    }
  };

  const handleDeleteIncome = (index: number) => {
    setIncome(income.filter((_, i) => i !== index));
  };

  const handleDeleteExpense = (index: number) => {
    setExpenses(expenses.filter((_, i) => i !== index));
  };

  const handleAddCategory = (type: 'income' | 'expense') => {
    if (newCategory) {
      if (type === 'income') {
        setIncomeCategories([...incomeCategories, newCategory]);
      } else {
        setExpenseCategories([...expenseCategories, newCategory]);
      }
      setNewCategory('');
    }
  };

  const chartData = expenses.map(expense => ({
    name: expense.description,
    value: expense.amount
  }));

  const COLORS = ['#0088FE', '#00C49F', '#FFBB28', '#FF8042', '#8884d8', '#82ca9d'];

  const renderChart = () => {
    switch (chartType) {
      case 'pie':
        return (
          <PieChart width={400} height={300}>
            <Pie
              data={chartData}
              cx={200}
              cy={150}
              labelLine={false}
              outerRadius={80}
              fill="#8884d8"
              dataKey="value"
            >
              {chartData.map((entry, index) => (
                <Cell key={`cell-${index}`} fill={COLORS[index % COLORS.length]} />
              ))}
            </Pie>
            <Tooltip />
            <Legend />
          </PieChart>
        );

            <XAxis dataKey="name" />
            <YAxis />

          </BarChart>

      <main className="container mx-auto p-4">

          <div className="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow">
            <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Entrées d'argent</h2>
            <div className="flex flex-wrap mb-2">
              <select 
                className="flex-grow mr-2 p-2 border rounded mb-2 sm:mb-0"
                value={newIncome.description}
                onChange={(e) => setNewIncome({ ...newIncome, description: e.target.value })}
              >
                <option value="">Sélectionner une catégorie</option>
                {incomeCategories.map((cat, index) => (
                  <option key={index} value={cat}>{cat}</option>
                ))}
              </select>
              <input

                placeholder="Montant"
                className="w-full sm:w-24 mr-2 p-2 border rounded mb-2 sm:mb-0"
                value={newIncome.amount}
                onChange={(e) => setNewIncome({ ...newIncome, amount: e.target.value })}
              />
              <button
                className="w-full sm:w-auto bg-indigo-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded"
                onClick={handleAddIncome}
              >
                + Ajouter
              </button>
            </div>
            <div className="flex mb-2">
              <input
                type="text"
                placeholder="Nouvelle catégorie"
                className="flex-grow mr-2 p-2 border rounded"
                value={newCategory}
                onChange={(e) => setNewCategory(e.target.value)}
              />
              <button
                className="bg-green-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded"
                onClick={() => handleAddCategory('income')}
              >
                + Catégorie
              </button>
            </div>
            {income.map((item, index) => (
              <div key={index} className="flex justify-between items-center mt-2">
                <span>{item.description}: {item.amount} €</span>
                <Trash2
                  className="text-red-500 cursor-pointer"
                  onClick={() => handleDeleteIncome(index)}
                />
              </div>
            ))}
            <div className="mt-4 font-semibold">
              Total des entrées: {totalIncome.toFixed(2)} €
            </div>
          </div>

          <div className="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow">
            <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Ajouter une dépense</h2>
            <div className="flex flex-wrap mb-2">
              <select
                className="flex-grow mr-2 p-2 border rounded mb-2 sm:mb-0"
                value={newExpense.description}
                onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({ ...newExpense, description: e.target.value })}
              >
                <option value="">Sélectionner une catégorie</option>

                ))}
              </select>
              <input

                value={newExpense.amount}

              />
              <input
                type="date"
                className="w-full sm:w-32 mr-2 p-2 border rounded mb-2 sm:mb-0"
                value={newExpense.date}
                onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({ ...newExpense, date: e.target.value })}
              />
              <button
                className="w-full sm:w-auto bg-indigo-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded"
                onClick={handleAddExpense}
              >
                + Ajouter
              </button>
            </div>
            <div className="flex mb-2">
              <input
                type="text"
                placeholder="Nouvelle catégorie"
                className="flex-grow mr-2 p-2 border rounded"
                value={newCategory}
                onChange={(e) => setNewCategory(e.target.value)}
              />
              <button
                className="bg-green-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded"
                onClick={() => handleAddCategory('expense')}
              >
                + Catégorie
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div className="bg-green-100 p-4 rounded-lg shadow mb-4">
          <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold">Argent restant: {remainingMoney.toFixed(2)} €</h2>
        </div>

        <div className="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow mb-4">

  const toggleTheme = () => {
    setIsDarkTheme(!isDarkTheme);
  };

  const totalExpenses = expenses.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.amount, 0);

    if (newIncome.description && newIncome.amount) {
      setIncome([...income, { ...newIncome, amount: Number(newIncome.amount) }]);
      setNewIncome({ description: '', amount: '' });
    }
  };

  const handleAddExpense = () => {
    if (newExpense.description && newExpense.amount && newExpense.date) {
      setExpenses([...expenses, { ...newExpense, amount: Number(newExpense.amount) }]);
      setNewExpense({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
    }
  };

  const handleDeleteIncome = (index: number) => {
    setIncome(income.filter((_, i) => i !== index));
  };

  const handleDeleteExpense = (index: number) => {
    setExpenses(expenses.filter((_, i) => i !== index));
  };

  const handleAddCategory = (type: 'income' | 'expense') => {
    if (newCategory) {
      if (type === 'income') {
        setIncomeCategories([...incomeCategories, newCategory]);
      } else {
        setExpenseCategories([...expenseCategories, newCategory]);
      }
      setNewCategory('');
    }

  const chartData = expenses.map(expense => ({

    value: expense.amount

              fill="#8884d8"
              dataKey="value"

              {chartData.map((entry, index) => (

            <Tooltip />
            <Legend />
          </PieChart>

          </BarChart>

import React, { useState } from 'react';

interface IncomeItem {
  description: string;
  amount: number;
}

interface ExpenseItem {
  description: string;
  amount: number;
  date: string;
}

const BudgetApp: React.FC = () => {
  const [incomeCategories, setIncomeCategories] = useState<string[]>(['Salaire net', 'Freelance', 'Investissements']);
  const [expenseCategories, setExpenseCategories] = useState<string[]>(['Loyer', 'Courses', 'Transport', 'Loisirs', 'Santé']);
  const [income, setIncome] = useState<IncomeItem[]>([]);
  const [expenses, setExpenses] = useState<ExpenseItem[]>([]);
  const [newIncome, setNewIncome] = useState<{ description: string; amount: string }>({ description: '', amount: '' });
  const [newExpense, setNewExpense] = useState<{ description: string; amount: string; date: string }>({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
  const [newCategory, setNewCategory] = useState<string>('');
  const [chartType, setChartType] = useState<string>('pie');
  const [isDarkTheme, setIsDarkTheme] = useState<boolean>(false);

  const themeClasses = isDarkTheme ? 'dark' : 'light';

  const toggleTheme = () => {
    setIsDarkTheme(!isDarkTheme);
  };

  const totalIncome = income.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.amount, 0);
  const totalExpenses = expenses.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.amount, 0);
  const remainingMoney = totalIncome - totalExpenses;

  const handleAddIncome = () => {
    if (newIncome.description && newIncome.amount) {
      setIncome([...income, { ...newIncome, amount: Number(newIncome.amount) }]);
      setNewIncome({ description: '', amount: '' });
    }
  };

  const handleAddExpense = () => {
    if (newExpense.description && newExpense.amount && newExpense.date) {
      setExpenses([...expenses, { ...newExpense, amount: Number(newExpense.amount) }]);
      setNewExpense({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
    }
  };

  const handleDeleteIncome = (index: number) => {
    setIncome(income.filter((_, i) => i !== index));
  };

  const handleDeleteExpense = (index: number) => {
    setExpenses(expenses.filter((_, i) => i !== index));
  };

  const handleAddCategory = (type: 'income' | 'expense') => {
    if (newCategory) {
      if (type === 'income') {
        setIncomeCategories([...incomeCategories, newCategory]);
      } else {
        setExpenseCategories([...expenseCategories, newCategory]);
      }
      setNewCategory('');
    }
  };

  const chartData = expenses.map(expense => ({
    name: expense.description,
    value: expense.amount
  }));

  const COLORS = ['#0088FE', '#00C49F', '#FFBB28', '#FF8042', '#8884d8', '#82ca9d'];

  const renderChart = () => {
    switch (chartType) {
      case 'pie':
        return (
          <PieChart width={400} height={300}>
            <Pie
              data={chartData}
              cx={200}
              cy={150}
              labelLine={false}
              outerRadius={80}
              fill="#8884d8"
              dataKey="value"
            >
              {chartData.map((entry, index) => (
                <Cell key={`cell-${index}`} fill={COLORS[index % COLORS.length]} />
              ))}
            </Pie>
            <Tooltip />
            <Legend />
          </PieChart>
        );
      case 'bar':
        return (
          <BarChart width={400} height={300} data={chartData}>
            <CartesianGrid strokeDasharray="3 3" />
            <XAxis dataKey="name" />
            <YAxis />
            <Tooltip />
            <Legend />
            <Bar dataKey="value" fill="#8884d8" />
          </BarChart>
        );
      case 'line':
        return (
          <LineChart width={400} height={300} data={chartData}>
            <CartesianGrid strokeDasharray="3 3" />
            <XAxis dataKey="name" />
            <YAxis />
            <Tooltip />
            <Legend />
            <Line type="monotone" dataKey="value" stroke="#8884d8" />
          </LineChart>
        );
      default:
        return null;
    }
  };

  return (
    <div className={`bg-gray-100 min-h-screen ${themeClasses}`}>
      <header className="bg-indigo-600 text-white p-4 flex justify-between items-center">
        <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold">Budget App</h1>
        <Moon className="cursor-pointer" onClick={toggleTheme} />
      </header>

      <main className="container mx-auto p-4">
        <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4 mb-4">
          <div className="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow">
            <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Entrées d'argent</h2>
            <div className="flex flex-wrap mb-2">
              <select 
                className="flex-grow mr-2 p-2 border rounded mb-2 sm:mb-0"
                value={newIncome.description}
                onChange={(e) => setNewIncome({ ...newIncome, description: e.target.value })}
              >
                <option value="">Sélectionner une catégorie</option>
                {incomeCategories.map((cat, index) => (
                  <option key={index} value={cat}>{cat}</option>
                ))}
              </select>
              <input
                type="text"
                placeholder="Montant"
                className="w-full sm:w-24 mr-2 p-2 border rounded mb-2 sm:mb-0"
                value={newIncome.amount}
                onChange={(e) => setNewIncome({ ...newIncome, amount: e.target.value })}
              />
              <button
                className="w-full sm:w-auto bg-indigo-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded"
                onClick={handleAddIncome}
              >
                + Ajouter
              </button>
            </div>
            <div className="flex mb-2">
              <input
                type="text"
                placeholder="Nouvelle catégorie"
                className="flex-grow mr-2 p-2 border rounded"
                value={newCategory}
                onChange={(e) => setNewCategory(e.target.value)}
              />
              <button
                className="bg-green-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded"
                onClick={() => handleAddCategory('income')}
              >
                + Catégorie
              </button>
            </div>
            {income.map((item, index) => (
              <div key={index} className="flex justify-between items-center mt-2">
                <span>{item.description}: {item.amount} €</span>
                <Trash2
                  className="text-red-500 cursor-pointer"
                  onClick={() => handleDeleteIncome(index)}
                />
              </div>
            ))}
            <div className="mt-4 font-semibold">
              Total des entrées: {totalIncome.toFixed(2)} €
            </div>
          </div>

          <div className="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow">
            <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Ajouter une dépense</h2>
            <div className="flex flex-wrap mb-2">
              <select
                className="flex-grow mr-2 p-2 border rounded mb-2 sm:mb-0"

                <option value="">Sélectionner une catégorie</option>

              <input

              />
              <input

                onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({ ...newExpense, date: e.target.value })}
              />
              <button

                onClick={handleAddExpense}
              >
                + Ajouter
              </button>
            </div>
            <div className="flex mb-2">
              <input

                placeholder="Nouvelle catégorie"

                onChange={(e) => setNewCategory(e.target.value)}
              />
              <button
                className="bg-green-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded"
                onClick={() => handleAddCategory('expense')}
              >
                + Catégorie
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div className="bg-green-100 p-4 rounded-lg shadow mb-4">

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Trash2, Download, Moon, Sun, Search } from 'lucide-react';
import { PieChart, Pie, Cell, Legend, Tooltip, BarChart, Bar, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, LineChart, Line } from 'recharts';

interface IncomeItem {
  description: string;
  amount: number;
}

interface ExpenseItem {
  description: string;
  amount: number;
  date: string;
}

const BudgetApp: React.FC = () => {
  const [incomeCategories, setIncomeCategories] = useState<string[]>(['Salaire net', 'Primes', "Prime d'activité", 'Freelance', 'Investissements']);
  const [expenseCategories, setExpenseCategories] = useState<string[]>(['Loyer', 'Courses', 'Transport', 'Loisirs', 'Santé']);
  const [income, setIncome] = useState<IncomeItem[]>([]);
  const [expenses, setExpenses] = useState<ExpenseItem[]>([]);
  const [newIncome, setNewIncome] = useState<{ description: string; amount: string }>({ description: '', amount: '' });
  const [newExpense, setNewExpense] = useState<{ description: string; amount: string; date: string }>({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
  const [newCategory, setNewCategory] = useState<string>('');
  const [chartType, setChartType] = useState<string>('pie');
  const [isDarkTheme, setIsDarkTheme] = useState<boolean>(false);

  const toggleTheme = () => {
    setIsDarkTheme(!isDarkTheme);
  };

  const totalIncome = income.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.amount, 0);
  const totalExpenses = expenses.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.amount, 0);
  const remainingMoney = totalIncome - totalExpenses;

  const handleAddIncome = () => {
    if (newIncome.description && newIncome.amount) {
      setIncome([...income, { ...newIncome, amount: Number(newIncome.amount) }]);
      setNewIncome({ description: '', amount: '' });
    }
  };

  const handleAddExpense = () => {
    if (newExpense.description && newExpense.amount && newExpense.date) {
      setExpenses([...expenses, { ...newExpense, amount: Number(newExpense.amount) }]);
      setNewExpense({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
    }
  };

  const handleDeleteIncome = (index: number) => {
    setIncome(income.filter((_, i) => i !== index));
  };

  const handleDeleteExpense = (index: number) => {
    setExpenses(expenses.filter((_, i) => i !== index));
  };

  const handleAddCategory = (type: 'income' | 'expense') => {
    if (newCategory) {
      if (type === 'income') {
        setIncomeCategories([...incomeCategories, newCategory]);
      } else {
        setExpenseCategories([...expenseCategories, newCategory]);
      }
      setNewCategory('');
    }
  };

  const chartData = expenses.map(expense => ({
    name: expense.description,
    value: expense.amount
  }));

  const COLORS = ['#0088FE', '#00C49F', '#FFBB28', '#FF8042', '#8884d8', '#82ca9d'];

  const renderChart = () => {
    switch (chartType) {
      case 'pie':
        return (
          <PieChart width={400} height={300}>
            <Pie
              data={chartData}
              cx={200}
              cy={150}
              labelLine={false}
              outerRadius={80}
              fill="#8884d8"
              dataKey="value"
            >
              {chartData.map((entry, index) => (
                <Cell key={`cell-${index}`} fill={COLORS[index % COLORS.length]} />
              ))}
            </Pie>
            <Tooltip />
            <Legend />
          </PieChart>
        );
      case 'bar':
        return (
          <BarChart width={400} height={300} data={chartData}>
            <CartesianGrid strokeDasharray="3 3" />
            <XAxis dataKey="name" />
            <YAxis />
            <Tooltip />
            <Legend />
            <Bar dataKey="value" fill="#8884d8" />
          </BarChart>
        );
      case 'line':
        return (
          <LineChart width={400} height={300} data={chartData}>
            <CartesianGrid strokeDasharray="3 3" />
            <XAxis dataKey="name" />
            <YAxis />
            <Tooltip />
            <Legend />
            <Line type="monotone" dataKey="value" stroke="#8884d8" />
          </LineChart>
        );
      default:
        return null;
    }
  };

  const themeClasses = isDarkTheme
    ? {
        body: "bg-gray-900 text-white",
        header: "bg-indigo-800",
        card: "bg-gray-800",
        input: "bg-gray-700 text-white border-gray-600",
        button: "bg-indigo-600 hover:bg-indigo-700",
        incomeText: "text-green-400",
        expenseText: "text-red-400",
        balanceCard: "bg-gray-700",
      }
    : {
        body: "bg-gray-100 text-gray-900",
        header: "bg-indigo-600",
        card: "bg-white",
        input: "bg-white text-gray-900 border-gray-300",
        button: "bg-indigo-600 hover:bg-indigo-700",
        incomeText: "text-green-600",
        expenseText: "text-red-600",
        balanceCard: "bg-green-100",
      };

  return (
    <div className={`${themeClasses.body} min-h-screen`}>
      <header className={`${themeClasses.header} text-white p-4 flex justify-between items-center`}>
        <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold">Budget App</h1>
        {isDarkTheme ? (
          <Sun className="cursor-pointer" onClick={toggleTheme} />
        ) : (
          <Moon className="cursor-pointer" onClick={toggleTheme} />
        )}
      </header>

      <main className="container mx-auto p-4">
        <div className={`${themeClasses.balanceCard} p-4 rounded-lg shadow mb-4`}>
          <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold">Budget Summary</h2>
          <div className="grid grid-cols-3 gap-4 mt-2">
            <div>
              <div className="text-sm opacity-75">Total Income</div>
              <div className={`text-lg font-bold ${themeClasses.incomeText}`}>{totalIncome.toFixed(2)} €</div>
            </div>
            <div>
              <div className="text-sm opacity-75">Total Expenses</div>
              <div className={`text-lg font-bold ${themeClasses.expenseText}`}>{totalExpenses.toFixed(2)} €</div>
            </div>
            <div>
              <div className="text-sm opacity-75">Balance</div>
              <div className={`text-lg font-bold ${remainingMoney >= 0 ? themeClasses.incomeText : themeClasses.expenseText}`}>
                {remainingMoney.toFixed(2)} €
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4 mb-4">
          <div className={`${themeClasses.card} p-4 rounded-lg shadow`}>
            <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Entrées d'argent</h2>
            <div className="flex flex-wrap mb-2">
              <select 
                className={`${themeClasses.input} flex-grow mr-2 p-2 rounded mb-2 sm:mb-0`}
                value={newIncome.description}
                onChange={(e) => setNewIncome({ ...newIncome, description: e.target.value })}
              >
                <option value="">Sélectionner une catégorie</option>
                {incomeCategories.map((cat, index) => (
                  <option key={index} value={cat}>{cat}</option>
                ))}
              </select>
              <input
                type="text"
                placeholder="Montant"
                className={`${themeClasses.input} w-full sm:w-24 mr-2 p-2 rounded mb-2 sm:mb-0`}
                value={newIncome.amount}
                onChange={(e) => setNewIncome({ ...newIncome, amount: e.target.value })}
              />
              <button
                className={`${themeClasses.button} w-full sm:w-auto text-white px-4 py-2 rounded`}
                onClick={handleAddIncome}
              >
                + Ajouter
              </button>
            </div>
            <div className="flex mb-2">
              <input
                type="text"
                placeholder="Nouvelle catégorie"
                className={`${themeClasses.input} flex-grow mr-2 p-2 rounded`}
                value={newCategory}
                onChange={(e) => setNewCategory(e.target.value)}
              />
              <button
                className="bg-green-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded"
                onClick={() => handleAddCategory('income')}
              >
                + Catégorie
              </button>
            </div>
            {income.map((item, index) => (
              <div key={index} className="flex justify-between items-center mt-2">
                <span>{item.description}: <span className={themeClasses.incomeText}>{item.amount} €</span></span>
                <Trash2
                  className="text-red-500 cursor-pointer"
                  onClick={() => handleDeleteIncome(index)}
                />
              </div>
            ))}
            <div className="mt-4 font-semibold">
              Total des entrées: <span className={themeClasses.incomeText}>{totalIncome.toFixed(2)} €</span>
            </div>
          </div>

          <div className={`${themeClasses.card} p-4 rounded-lg shadow`}>
            <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Ajouter une dépense</h2>
            <div className="flex flex-wrap mb-2">
              <select
                className={`${themeClasses.input} flex-grow mr-2 p-2 rounded mb-2 sm:mb-0`}
                value={newExpense.description}
                onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({ ...newExpense, description: e.target.value })}
              >
                <option value="">Sélectionner une catégorie</option>
                {expenseCategories.map((cat, index) => (
                  <option key={index} value={cat}>{cat}</option>
                ))}
              </select>
              <input
                type="text"
                placeholder="Montant"
                className={`${themeClasses.input} w-full sm:w-24 mr-2 p-2 rounded mb-2 sm:mb-0`}
                value={newExpense.amount}
                onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({ ...newExpense, amount: e.target.value })}
              />
              <input
                type="date"
                className={`${themeClasses.input} w-full sm:w-32 mr-2 p-2 rounded mb-2 sm:mb-0`}
                value={newExpense.date}

              />
              <button
                className={`${themeClasses.button} w-full sm:w-auto text-white px-4 py-2 rounded`}
                onClick={handleAddExpense}
              >
                + Ajouter
              </button>
            </div>
            <div className="flex mb-2">
              <input

              <button

                onClick={() => handleAddCategory('expense')}
              >
                + Catégorie
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div className={`${themeClasses.card} p-4 rounded-lg shadow mb-4`}>
          <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Sorties d'argent</h2>

GitHub Copilot: To commit changes to a new branch in Git, follow these steps:

1. **Create a New Branch**:
   ```bash
   git checkout -b new-branch-name
   ```

2. **Stage the Changes**:
   ```bash
   git add .
   ```

3. **Commit the Changes**:
   ```bash
   git commit -m "Your commit message"
   ```

4. **Push the New Branch to the Remote Repository**:
   ```bash
   git push -u origin new-branch-name
   ```

git checkout -b feature/add-theme-toggle
git add .
git commit -m "Add theme toggle functionality and improve input border contrast"

```

  description: string;

  const [newIncome, setNewIncome] = useState<{ description: string; amount: string }>({ description: '', amount: '' });
  const [newExpense, setNewExpense] = useState<{ description: string; amount: string; date: string }>({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
  const [newCategory, setNewCategory] = useState<string>('');

    setIsDarkTheme(!isDarkTheme);
  };

  const totalExpenses = expenses.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.amount, 0);
  const remainingMoney = totalIncome - totalExpenses;

  const handleAddIncome = () => {
    if (newIncome.description && newIncome.amount) {
      setIncome([...income, { ...newIncome, amount: Number(newIncome.amount) }]);
      setNewIncome({ description: '', amount: '' });
    }
  };

  const handleAddExpense = () => {
    if (newExpense.description && newExpense.amount && newExpense.date) {
      setExpenses([...expenses, { ...newExpense, amount: Number(newExpense.amount) }]);
      setNewExpense({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
    }
  };

        setExpenseCategories([...expenseCategories, newCategory]);

      setNewCategory('');

  };

  const chartData = expenses.map(expense => ({

              {chartData.map((entry, index) => (

              ))}
            </Pie>

            <Legend />
          </PieChart>
        );
      case 'bar':
        return (

            <XAxis dataKey="name" />
            <YAxis />
            <Tooltip />
            <Legend />
            <Bar dataKey="value" fill="#8884d8">
              {chartData.map((entry, index) => (
                <Cell key={`cell-${index}`} fill={COLORS[index % COLORS.length]} />

            </Bar>

              {chartData.map((entry, index) => (
                <Cell key={`cell-${index}`} fill={COLORS[index % COLORS.length]} />
              ))}
            </Line>
          </LineChart>
        );
      default:
        return null;
    }
  };

interface IncomeItem {
  description: string;
  amount: number;
}

interface ExpenseItem {
  description: string;
  amount: number;
  date: string;
}

const BudgetApp: React.FC = () => {
  const [incomeCategories, setIncomeCategories] = useState<string[]>(['Salaire net', 'Primes', "Prime d'activité", 'Freelance', 'Investissements']);

  const [income, setIncome] = useState<IncomeItem[]>([]);
  const [expenses, setExpenses] = useState<ExpenseItem[]>([]);

  const [newExpense, setNewExpense] = useState<{ description: string; amount: string; date: string }>({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
  const [newCategory, setNewCategory] = useState<string>('');
  const [chartType, setChartType] = useState<string>('pie');
  const [isDarkTheme, setIsDarkTheme] = useState<boolean>(false);

  const toggleTheme = () => {
    setIsDarkTheme(!isDarkTheme);
  };

  const totalIncome = income.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.amount, 0);
  const totalExpenses = expenses.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.amount, 0);
  const remainingMoney = totalIncome - totalExpenses;

  const handleAddIncome = () => {
    if (newIncome.description && newIncome.amount) {
      setIncome([...income, { ...newIncome, amount: Number(newIncome.amount) }]);
      setNewIncome({ description: '', amount: '' });
    }
  };

  const handleAddExpense = () => {
    if (newExpense.description && newExpense.amount && newExpense.date) {
      setExpenses([...expenses, { ...newExpense, amount: Number(newExpense.amount) }]);
      setNewExpense({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
    }
  };

  const handleDeleteIncome = (index: number) => {

  };

  };

  const handleAddCategory = (type: 'income' | 'expense') => {

        setExpenseCategories([...expenseCategories, newCategory]);
      }
      setNewCategory('');
    }
  };

  const chartData = expenses.map(expense => ({

  }));

              dataKey="value"

              {chartData.map((entry, index) => (

              ))}
            </Pie>
            <Tooltip />
            <Legend />
          </PieChart>
        );
      case 'bar':

            <XAxis dataKey="name" />
            <YAxis />
            <Tooltip />
            <Legend />
            <Bar dataKey="value" fill="#8884d8">
              {chartData.map((entry, index) => (
                <Cell key={`cell-${index}`} fill={COLORS[index % COLORS.length]} />
              ))}
            </Bar>

      case 'line':

            <XAxis dataKey="name" />
            <YAxis />
            <Tooltip />
            <Legend />
            <Line type="monotone" dataKey="value" stroke="#8884d8">
              {chartData.map((entry, index) => (
                <Cell key={`cell-${index}`} fill={COLORS[index % COLORS.length]} />
              ))}
            </Line>
          </LineChart>
        );
      default:
        return null;
    }
  };

  return (
    <div className={`min-h-screen ${isDarkTheme ? 'bg-gray-900 text-white' : 'bg-gray-100 text-black'}`}>
      <header className="bg-indigo-600 text-white p-4 flex justify-between items-center">
        <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold">Budget App</h1>
        {isDarkTheme ? (
          <Sun className="cursor-pointer" onClick={toggleTheme} />

              >

                ))}

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Trash2, Download, Moon, Sun, Search } from 'lucide-react';
import { PieChart, Pie, Cell, Legend, Tooltip, BarChart, Bar, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, LineChart, Line } from 'recharts';

interface IncomeItem {
  description: string;
  amount: number;
}

interface ExpenseItem {
  description: string;
  amount: number;
  date: string;
}

const BudgetApp: React.FC = () => {
  const [incomeCategories, setIncomeCategories] = useState<string[]>(['Salaire net', 'Primes', "Prime d'activité", 'Freelance', 'Investissements']);
  const [expenseCategories, setExpenseCategories] = useState<string[]>(['Loyer', 'Courses', 'Transport', 'Loisirs', 'Santé']);
  const [income, setIncome] = useState<IncomeItem[]>([]);
  const [expenses, setExpenses] = useState<ExpenseItem[]>([]);
  const [newIncome, setNewIncome] = useState<{ description: string; amount: string }>({ description: '', amount: '' });
  const [newExpense, setNewExpense] = useState<{ description: string; amount: string; date: string }>({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
  const [newCategory, setNewCategory] = useState<string>('');
  const [chartType, setChartType] = useState<string>('pie');
  const [isDarkTheme, setIsDarkTheme] = useState<boolean>(false);

  const toggleTheme = () => {
    setIsDarkTheme(!isDarkTheme);
  };

  const totalIncome = income.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.amount, 0);
  const totalExpenses = expenses.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.amount, 0);
  const remainingMoney = totalIncome - totalExpenses;

  const handleAddIncome = () => {
    if (newIncome.description && newIncome.amount) {
      setIncome([...income, { ...newIncome, amount: Number(newIncome.amount) }]);
      setNewIncome({ description: '', amount: '' });
    }
  };

  const handleAddExpense = () => {
    if (newExpense.description && newExpense.amount && newExpense.date) {
      setExpenses([...expenses, { ...newExpense, amount: Number(newExpense.amount) }]);
      setNewExpense({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
    }
  };

  const handleDeleteIncome = (index: number) => {
    setIncome(income.filter((_, i) => i !== index));
  };

  const handleDeleteExpense = (index: number) => {
    setExpenses(expenses.filter((_, i) => i !== index));
  };

  const handleAddCategory = (type: 'income' | 'expense') => {
    if (newCategory) {
      if (type === 'income') {
        setIncomeCategories([...incomeCategories, newCategory]);
      } else {
        setExpenseCategories([...expenseCategories, newCategory]);
      }
      setNewCategory('');
    }
  };

  const chartData = expenses.map(expense => ({
    name: expense.description,
    value: expense.amount
  }));

  const COLORS = ['#0088FE', '#00C49F', '#FFBB28', '#FF8042', '#8884d8', '#82ca9d'];

  const renderChart = () => {
    switch (chartType) {
      case 'pie':
        return (
          <PieChart width={400} height={300}>
            <Pie
              data={chartData}
              cx={200}
              cy={150}
              labelLine={false}
              outerRadius={80}
              fill="#8884d8"
              dataKey="value"
            >
              {chartData.map((entry, index) => (
                <Cell key={`cell-${index}`} fill={COLORS[index % COLORS.length]} />
              ))}
            </Pie>
            <Tooltip />
            <Legend />
          </PieChart>
        );
      case 'bar':
        return (
          <BarChart width={400} height={300} data={chartData}>
            <CartesianGrid strokeDasharray="3 3" />
            <XAxis dataKey="name" />
            <YAxis />
            <Tooltip />
            <Legend />
            <Bar dataKey="value" fill="#8884d8">
              {chartData.map((entry, index) => (
                <Cell key={`cell-${index}`} fill={COLORS[index % COLORS.length]} />
              ))}
            </Bar>
          </BarChart>
        );
      case 'line':
        return (
          <LineChart width={400} height={300} data={chartData}>
            <CartesianGrid strokeDasharray="3 3" />
            <XAxis dataKey="name" />
            <YAxis />
            <Tooltip />
            <Legend />
            <Line type="monotone" dataKey="value" stroke="#8884d8">
              {chartData.map((entry, index) => (
                <Cell key={`cell-${index}`} fill={COLORS[index % COLORS.length]} />
              ))}
            </Line>
          </LineChart>
        );
      default:
        return null;
    }
  };

  return (
    <div className={`min-h-screen ${isDarkTheme ? 'bg-gray-900 text-white' : 'bg-gray-100 text-black'}`}>
      <header className="bg-indigo-600 text-white p-4 flex justify-between items-center">
        <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold">Budget App</h1>
        {isDarkTheme ? (
          <Sun className="cursor-pointer" onClick={toggleTheme} />
        ) : (
          <Moon className="cursor-pointer" onClick={toggleTheme} />
        )}
      </header>

      <main className="container mx-auto p-4">
        <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4 mb-4">
          <div className={`p-4 rounded-lg shadow ${isDarkTheme ? 'bg-gray-800' : 'bg-white'}`}>
            <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Entrées d'argent</h2>
            <div className="flex flex-wrap mb-2">
              <select 
                className={`flex-grow mr-2 p-2 border rounded mb-2 sm:mb-0 ${isDarkTheme ? 'border-gray-700' : 'border-gray-300'}`}
                value={newIncome.description}
                onChange={(e) => setNewIncome({ ...newIncome, description: e.target.value })}
              >
                <option value="">Sélectionner une catégorie</option>
                {incomeCategories.map((cat, index) => (
                  <option key={index} value={cat}>{cat}</option>
                ))}
              </select>
              <input
                type="text"
                placeholder="Montant"
                className={`w-full sm:w-24 mr-2 p-2 border rounded mb-2 sm:mb-0 ${isDarkTheme ? 'border-gray-700' : 'border-gray-300'}`}
                value={newIncome.amount}
                onChange={(e) => setNewIncome({ ...newIncome, amount: e.target.value })}
              />
              <button
                className="w-full sm:w-auto bg-indigo-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded"
                onClick={handleAddIncome}
              >
                + Ajouter
              </button>
            </div>
            <div className="flex mb-2">
              <input
                type="text"
                placeholder="Nouvelle catégorie"
                className={`flex-grow mr-2 p-2 border rounded ${isDarkTheme ? 'border-gray-700' : 'border-gray-300'}`}
                value={newCategory}
                onChange={(e) => setNewCategory(e.target.value)}
              />
              <button
                className="bg-green-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded"
                onClick={() => handleAddCategory('income')}
              >
                + Catégorie
              </button>
            </div>
            {income.map((item, index) => (
              <div key={index} className="flex justify-between items-center mt-2">
                <span>{item.description}: {item.amount} €</span>
                <Trash2
                  className="text-red-500 cursor-pointer"
                  onClick={() => handleDeleteIncome(index)}
                />
              </div>
            ))}
            <div className="mt-4 font-semibold">
              Total des entrées: {totalIncome.toFixed(2)} €
            </div>
          </div>

          <div className={`p-4 rounded-lg shadow ${isDarkTheme ? 'bg-gray-800' : 'bg-white'}`}>
            <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Ajouter une dépense</h2>
            <div className="flex flex-wrap mb-2">
              <select
                className={`flex-grow mr-2 p-2 border rounded mb-2 sm:mb-0 ${isDarkTheme ? 'border-gray-700' : 'border-gray-300'}`}
                value={newExpense.description}
                onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({ ...newExpense, description: e.target.value })}
              >
                <option value="">Sélectionner une catégorie</option>
                {expenseCategories.map((cat, index) => (

                ))}
              </select>
              <input

                className={`w-full sm:w-24 mr-2 p-2 border rounded mb-2 sm:mb-0 ${isDarkTheme ? 'border-gray-700' : 'border-gray-300'}`}
                value={newExpense.amount}
                onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({ ...newExpense, amount: e.target.value })}
              />
              <input
