```tsx
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Route, Routes, Link } from 'react-router-dom';
import { Sun, Moon, Trash, Download } from 'lucide-react';
import { CSVLink } from 'react-csv';
import ExpensesChartPage from './components/ExpensesChartPage';
import BudgetSummary from './components/BudgetSummary';

interface IncomeItem {
  description: string;
  amount: number;
}

interface ExpenseItem {
  description: string;
  amount: number;
  date: string;
}

const App: React.FC = () => {
  const [incomeCategories, setIncomeCategories] = useState<string[]>(['Salaire net', 'Primes', "Prime d'activité", 'Freelance', 'Investissements']);
  const [expenseCategories, setExpenseCategories] = useState<string[]>(['Loyer', 'Courses', 'Transport', 'Loisirs', 'Santé']);
  const [income, setIncome] = useState<IncomeItem[]>([]);
  const [expenses, setExpenses] = useState<ExpenseItem[]>([]);
  const [newIncome, setNewIncome] = useState<{ description: string; amount: string }>({ description: '', amount: '' });
  const [newExpense, setNewExpense] = useState<{ description: string; amount: string; date: string }>({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
  const [newCategory, setNewCategory] = useState<string>('');
  const [isDarkTheme, setIsDarkTheme] = useState<boolean>(false);

  const toggleTheme = () => setIsDarkTheme(!isDarkTheme);

  const totalIncome = income.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.amount, 0);
  const totalExpenses = expenses.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.amount, 0);

  const handleAddIncome = () => {
    if (newIncome.description && newIncome.amount) {
      setIncome([...income, { ...newIncome, amount: Number(newIncome.amount) }]);
      setNewIncome({ description: '', amount: '' });
    }
  };

  const handleAddExpense = () => {
    if (newExpense.description && newExpense.amount && newExpense.date) {
      setExpenses([...expenses, { ...newExpense, amount: Number(newExpense.amount) }]);
      setNewExpense({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
    }
  };

  const handleAddCategory = (type: 'income' | 'expense') => {
    if (newCategory) {
      if (type === 'income') {
        setIncomeCategories([...incomeCategories, newCategory]);
      } else {
        setExpenseCategories([...expenseCategories, newCategory]);
      }
      setNewCategory('');
    }
  };

  const csvHeaders = [
    { label: 'Description', key: 'description' },
    { label: 'Amount', key: 'amount' },
    { label: 'Date', key: 'date' }
  ];

  return (
    <div className={`min-h-screen ${isDarkTheme ? 'bg-gray-900 text-white' : 'bg-gray-100 text-black'}`}>
      <header className="bg-indigo-600 text-white p-4 flex justify-between items-center">
        <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold">Budget App</h1>
        <nav>
          <Link to="/" className="mr-4">Home</Link>
          <Link to="/expenses-chart">Répartition des dépenses</Link>
        </nav>
        {isDarkTheme ? (
          <Sun className="cursor-pointer" onClick={toggleTheme} />
        ) : (
          <Moon className="cursor-pointer" onClick={toggleTheme} />
        )}
      </header>

      <Routes>
        <Route path="/" element={
          <main className="container mx-auto p-4">
            <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4">
              <div className="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow">
                <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Entrées d'argent</h2>
                <div className="flex flex-col space-y-2">
                  <select
                    value={newIncome.description}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewIncome({...newIncome, description: e.target.value})}
                    className="p-2 border rounded"
                  >
                    <option value="">Sélectionner une catégorie</option>
                    {incomeCategories.map((category, index) => (
                      <option key={index} value={category}>{category}</option>
                    ))}
                  </select>
                  <input
                    type="number"
                    value={newIncome.amount}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewIncome({...newIncome, amount: e.target.value})}
                    placeholder="Montant"
                    className="p-2 border rounded"
                  />
                  <button onClick={handleAddIncome} className="bg-blue-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded">+ Ajouter</button>
                </div>
                <div className="mt-2">
                  <input
                    type="text"
                    value={newCategory}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewCategory(e.target.value)}
                    placeholder="Nouvelle catégorie"
                    className="p-2 border rounded mr-2"
                  />
                  <button onClick={() => handleAddCategory('income')} className="bg-green-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded">+ Catégorie</button>
                </div>
              </div>

              <div className="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow">
                <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Ajouter une dépense</h2>
                <div className="flex flex-col space-y-2">
                  <select
                    value={newExpense.description}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({...newExpense, description: e.target.value})}
                    className="p-2 border rounded"
                  >
                    <option value="">Sélectionner une catégorie</option>
                    {expenseCategories.map((category, index) => (
                      <option key={index} value={category}>{category}</option>
                    ))}
                  </select>
                  <input
                    type="number"
                    value={newExpense.amount}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({...newExpense, amount: e.target.value})}
                    placeholder="Montant"
                    className="p-2 border rounded"
                  />
                  <input
                    type="date"
                    value={newExpense.date}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({...newExpense, date: e.target.value})}
                    className="p-2 border rounded"
                  />
                  <button onClick={handleAddExpense} className="bg-red-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded">+ Ajouter</button>
                </div>
                <div className="mt-2">
                  <input
                    type="text"
                    value={newCategory}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewCategory(e.target.value)}
                    placeholder="Nouvelle catégorie"
                    className="p-2 border rounded mr-2"
                  />
                  <button onClick={() => handleAddCategory('expense')} className="bg-green-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded">+ Catégorie</button>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>

            {/* Budget Summary */}
            <div className="container mx-auto mt-8">
              <BudgetSummary totalIncome={totalIncome} totalExpenses={totalExpenses} />
            </div>

            <div className="mt-8">
              <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Sorties d'argent</h2>
              <div className="flex justify-between items-center mb-4">
                <input
                  type="text"
                  placeholder="Rechercher des dépenses..."
                  className="w-full p-2 border rounded"
                  // You can add functionality to filter expenses here
                />
                <CSVLink
                  data={expenses}
                  headers={csvHeaders}
                  filename="expenses.csv"
                  className="ml-4 text-blue-500 hover:text-blue-700"
                >
                  <Download className="w-6 h-6" />
                </CSVLink>
              </div>
              <ul>
                {expenses.map((expense, index) => (
                  <li
                    key={index}
                    className="flex justify-between items-center border-b py-2"
                  >
                    <div>
                      <span className="font-semibold">{expense.description}</span>
                      <span className="text-gray-500 ml-2">{expense.date}</span>
                    </div>
                    <div className="flex items-center">
                      <span className="text-red-500">{expense.amount} €</span>
                      <button
                        onClick={() => {
                          const updatedExpenses = expenses.filter((_, i) => i !== index);
                          setExpenses(updatedExpenses);
                        }}
                        className="ml-4 text-red-500 hover:text-red-700"
                      >
                        <Trash className="w-6 h-6" />
                      </button>
                    </div>
                  </li>
                ))}
              </ul>
            </div>
          </main>
        } />
        <Route path="/expenses-chart" element={<ExpensesChartPage expenses={expenses} isDarkTheme={isDarkTheme} />} />
      </Routes>
    </div>
  );
};

export default App;
```

```tsx
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Route, Routes, Link } from 'react-router-dom';
import { Sun, Moon, Trash, Download } from 'lucide-react';
import { CSVLink } from 'react-csv';
import ExpensesChartPage from './components/ExpensesChartPage';
import BudgetSummary from './components/BudgetSummary';

interface IncomeItem {
  description: string;
  amount: number;
}

interface ExpenseItem {
  description: string;
  amount: number;
  date: string;
}

const App: React.FC = () => {
  const [incomeCategories, setIncomeCategories] = useState<string[]>(['Salaire net', 'Primes', "Prime d'activité", 'Freelance', 'Investissements']);
  const [expenseCategories, setExpenseCategories] = useState<string[]>(['Loyer', 'Courses', 'Transport', 'Loisirs', 'Santé']);
  const [income, setIncome] = useState<IncomeItem[]>([]);
  const [expenses, setExpenses] = useState<ExpenseItem[]>([]);
  const [newIncome, setNewIncome] = useState<{ description: string; amount: string }>({ description: '', amount: '' });
  const [newExpense, setNewExpense] = useState<{ description: string; amount: string; date: string }>({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
  const [newCategory, setNewCategory] = useState<string>('');
  const [isDarkTheme, setIsDarkTheme] = useState<boolean>(false);

  const toggleTheme = () => setIsDarkTheme(!isDarkTheme);

  const totalIncome = income.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.amount, 0);
  const totalExpenses = expenses.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.amount, 0);

  const handleAddIncome = () => {
    if (newIncome.description && newIncome.amount) {
      setIncome([...income, { ...newIncome, amount: Number(newIncome.amount) }]);
      setNewIncome({ description: '', amount: '' });
    }
  };

  const handleAddExpense = () => {
    if (newExpense.description && newExpense.amount && newExpense.date) {
      setExpenses([...expenses, { ...newExpense, amount: Number(newExpense.amount) }]);
      setNewExpense({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
    }
  };

  const handleAddCategory = (type: 'income' | 'expense') => {
    if (newCategory) {
      if (type === 'income') {
        setIncomeCategories([...incomeCategories, newCategory]);
      } else {
        setExpenseCategories([...expenseCategories, newCategory]);
      }
      setNewCategory('');
    }
  };

  const csvHeaders = [
    { label: 'Description', key: 'description' },
    { label: 'Amount', key: 'amount' },
    { label: 'Date', key: 'date' }
  ];

  return (
    <div className={`min-h-screen ${isDarkTheme ? 'bg-gray-900 text-white' : 'bg-gray-100 text-black'}`}>
      <header className="bg-indigo-600 text-white p-4 flex justify-between items-center">
        <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold">Budget App</h1>
        <nav>
          <Link to="/" className="mr-4">Home</Link>
          <Link to="/expenses-chart">Répartition des dépenses</Link>
        </nav>
        {isDarkTheme ? (
          <Sun className="cursor-pointer" onClick={toggleTheme} />
        ) : (
          <Moon className="cursor-pointer" onClick={toggleTheme} />
        )}
      </header>

      <Routes>
        <Route path="/" element={
          <main className="container mx-auto p-4">
            <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4">
              <div className="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow">
                <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Entrées d'argent</h2>
                <div className="flex flex-col space-y-2">
                  <select
                    value={newIncome.description}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewIncome({...newIncome, description: e.target.value})}
                    className="p-2 border rounded"
                  >
                    <option value="">Sélectionner une catégorie</option>
                    {incomeCategories.map((category, index) => (
                      <option key={index} value={category}>{category}</option>
                    ))}
                  </select>
                  <input
                    type="number"
                    value={newIncome.amount}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewIncome({...newIncome, amount: e.target.value})}
                    placeholder="Montant"
                    className="p-2 border rounded"
                  />
                  <button onClick={handleAddIncome} className="bg-blue-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded">+ Ajouter</button>
                </div>
                <div className="mt-2">
                  <input
                    type="text"
                    value={newCategory}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewCategory(e.target.value)}
                    placeholder="Nouvelle catégorie"
                    className="p-2 border rounded mr-2"
                  />
                  <button onClick={() => handleAddCategory('income')} className="bg-green-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded">+ Catégorie</button>
                </div>
              </div>

              <div className="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow">
                <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Ajouter une dépense</h2>
                <div className="flex flex-col space-y-2">
                  <select
                    value={newExpense.description}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({...newExpense, description: e.target.value})}
                    className="p-2 border rounded"
                  >
                    <option value="">Sélectionner une catégorie</option>
                    {expenseCategories.map((category, index) => (
                      <option key={index} value={category}>{category}</option>
                    ))}
                  </select>
                  <input
                    type="number"
                    value={newExpense.amount}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({...newExpense, amount: e.target.value})}
                    placeholder="Montant"
                    className="p-2 border rounded"
                  />
                  <input
                    type="date"
                    value={newExpense.date}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({...newExpense, date: e.target.value})}
                    className="p-2 border rounded"
                  />
                  <button onClick={handleAddExpense} className="bg-red-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded">+ Ajouter</button>
                </div>
                <div className="mt-2">
                  <input
                    type="text"
                    value={newCategory}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewCategory(e.target.value)}
                    placeholder="Nouvelle catégorie"
                    className="p-2 border rounded mr-2"
                  />
                  <button onClick={() => handleAddCategory('expense')} className="bg-green-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded">+ Catégorie</button>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>

            {/* Budget Summary */}
            <div className="container mx-auto mt-8">
              <BudgetSummary totalIncome={totalIncome} totalExpenses={totalExpenses} />
            </div>

            <div className="mt-8">
              <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Sorties d'argent</h2>
              <div className="flex justify-between items-center mb-4">
                <input
                  type="text"
                  placeholder="Rechercher des dépenses..."
                  className="w-full p-2 border rounded"
                  // You can add functionality to filter expenses here
                />
                <CSVLink
                  data={expenses}
                  headers={csvHeaders}
                  filename="expenses.csv"
                  className="ml-4 text-blue-500 hover:text-blue-700"
                >
                  <Download className="w-6 h-6" />
                </CSVLink>
              </div>
              <ul>
                {expenses.map((expense, index) => (
                  <li
                    key={index}
                    className="flex justify-between items-center border-b py-2"
                  >
                    <div>
                      <span className="font-semibold">{expense.description}</span>
                      <span className="text-gray-500 ml-2">{expense.date}</span>
                    </div>
                    <div className="flex items-center">
                      <span className="text-red-500">{expense.amount} €</span>
                      <button
                        onClick={() => {
                          const updatedExpenses = expenses.filter((_, i) => i !== index);
                          setExpenses(updatedExpenses);
                        }}
                        className="ml-4 text-red-500 hover:text-red-700"
                      >
                        <Trash className="w-6 h-6" />
                      </button>
                    </div>
                  </li>
                ))}
              </ul>
            </div>
          </main>
        } />
        <Route path="/expenses-chart" element={<ExpensesChartPage expenses={expenses} isDarkTheme={isDarkTheme} />} />
      </Routes>
    </div>
  );
};

export default App;
```

```tsx
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Route, Routes, Link } from 'react-router-dom';
import { Sun, Moon, Trash, Download } from 'lucide-react';
import { CSVLink } from 'react-csv';
import ExpensesChartPage from './components/ExpensesChartPage';
import BudgetSummary from './components/BudgetSummary';

interface IncomeItem {
  description: string;
  amount: number;
}

interface ExpenseItem {
  description: string;
  amount: number;
  date: string;
}

const App: React.FC = () => {
  const [incomeCategories, setIncomeCategories] = useState<string[]>(['Salaire net', 'Primes', "Prime d'activité", 'Freelance', 'Investissements']);
  const [expenseCategories, setExpenseCategories] = useState<string[]>(['Loyer', 'Courses', 'Transport', 'Loisirs', 'Santé']);
  const [income, setIncome] = useState<IncomeItem[]>([]);
  const [expenses, setExpenses] = useState<ExpenseItem[]>([]);
  const [newIncome, setNewIncome] = useState<{ description: string; amount: string }>({ description: '', amount: '' });
  const [newExpense, setNewExpense] = useState<{ description: string; amount: string; date: string }>({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
  const [newCategory, setNewCategory] = useState<string>('');
  const [isDarkTheme, setIsDarkTheme] = useState<boolean>(false);

  const toggleTheme = () => setIsDarkTheme(!isDarkTheme);

  const totalIncome = income.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.amount, 0);
  const totalExpenses = expenses.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.amount, 0);

  const handleAddIncome = () => {
    if (newIncome.description && newIncome.amount) {
      setIncome([...income, { ...newIncome, amount: Number(newIncome.amount) }]);
      setNewIncome({ description: '', amount: '' });
    }
  };

  const handleAddExpense = () => {
    if (newExpense.description && newExpense.amount && newExpense.date) {
      setExpenses([...expenses, { ...newExpense, amount: Number(newExpense.amount) }]);
      setNewExpense({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
    }
  };

  const handleAddCategory = (type: 'income' | 'expense') => {
    if (newCategory) {
      if (type === 'income') {
        setIncomeCategories([...incomeCategories, newCategory]);
      } else {
        setExpenseCategories([...expenseCategories, newCategory]);
      }
      setNewCategory('');
    }
  };

  const csvHeaders = [
    { label: 'Description', key: 'description' },
    { label: 'Amount', key: 'amount' },
    { label: 'Date', key: 'date' }
  ];

  return (
    <div className={`min-h-screen ${isDarkTheme ? 'bg-gray-900 text-white' : 'bg-gray-100 text-black'}`}>
      <header className="bg-indigo-600 text-white p-4 flex justify-between items-center">
        <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold">Budget App</h1>
        <nav>
          <Link to="/" className="mr-4">Home</Link>
          <Link to="/expenses-chart">Répartition des dépenses</Link>
        </nav>
        {isDarkTheme ? (
          <Sun className="cursor-pointer" onClick={toggleTheme} />
        ) : (
          <Moon className="cursor-pointer" onClick={toggleTheme} />
        )}
      </header>

      <Routes>
        <Route path="/" element={
          <main className="container mx-auto p-4">
            <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4">
              <div className="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow">
                <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Entrées d'argent</h2>
                <div className="flex flex-col space-y-2">
                  <select
                    value={newIncome.description}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewIncome({...newIncome, description: e.target.value})}
                    className="p-2 border rounded"
                  >
                    <option value="">Sélectionner une catégorie</option>
                    {incomeCategories.map((category, index) => (
                      <option key={index} value={category}>{category}</option>
                    ))}
                  </select>
                  <input
                    type="number"
                    value={newIncome.amount}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewIncome({...newIncome, amount: e.target.value})}
                    placeholder="Montant"
                    className="p-2 border rounded"
                  />
                  <button onClick={handleAddIncome} className="bg-blue-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded">+ Ajouter</button>
                </div>
                <div className="mt-2">
                  <input
                    type="text"
                    value={newCategory}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewCategory(e.target.value)}
                    placeholder="Nouvelle catégorie"
                    className="p-2 border rounded mr-2"
                  />
                  <button onClick={() => handleAddCategory('income')} className="bg-green-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded">+ Catégorie</button>
                </div>
              </div>

              <div className="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow">
                <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Ajouter une dépense</h2>
                <div className="flex flex-col space-y-2">
                  <select
                    value={newExpense.description}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({...newExpense, description: e.target.value})}
                    className="p-2 border rounded"
                  >
                    <option value="">Sélectionner une catégorie</option>
                    {expenseCategories.map((category, index) => (
                      <option key={index} value={category}>{category}</option>
                    ))}
                  </select>
                  <input
                    type="number"
                    value={newExpense.amount}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({...newExpense, amount: e.target.value})}
                    placeholder="Montant"
                    className="p-2 border rounded"
                  />
                  <input
                    type="date"
                    value={newExpense.date}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({...newExpense, date: e.target.value})}
                    className="p-2 border rounded"
                  />
                  <button onClick={handleAddExpense} className="bg-red-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded">+ Ajouter</button>
                </div>
                <div className="mt-2">
                  <input
                    type="text"
                    value={newCategory}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewCategory(e.target.value)}
                    placeholder="Nouvelle catégorie"
                    className="p-2 border rounded mr-2"
                  />
                  <button onClick={() => handleAddCategory('expense')} className="bg-green-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded">+ Catégorie</button>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>

            {/* Budget Summary */}
            <div className="container mx-auto mt-8">
              <BudgetSummary totalIncome={totalIncome} totalExpenses={totalExpenses} />
            </div>

            <div className="mt-8">
              <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Sorties d'argent</h2>
              <div className="flex justify-between items-center mb-4">
                <input
                  type="text"
                  placeholder="Rechercher des dépenses..."
                  className="w-full p-2 border rounded"
                  // You can add functionality to filter expenses here
                />
                <CSVLink
                  data={expenses}
                  headers={csvHeaders}
                  filename="expenses.csv"
                  className="ml-4 text-blue-500 hover:text-blue-700"
                >
                  <Download className="w-6 h-6" />
                </CSVLink>
              </div>
              <ul>
                {expenses.map((expense, index) => (
                  <li
                    key={index}
                    className="flex justify-between items-center border-b py-2"
                  >
                    <div>
                      <span className="font-semibold">{expense.description}</span>
                      <span className="text-gray-500 ml-2">{expense.date}</span>
                    </div>
                    <div className="flex items-center">
                      <span className="text-red-500">{expense.amount} €</span>
                      <button
                        onClick={() => {
                          const updatedExpenses = expenses.filter((_, i) => i !== index);
                          setExpenses(updatedExpenses);
                        }}
                        className="ml-4 text-red-500 hover:text-red-700"
                      >
                        <Trash className="w-6 h-6" />
                      </button>
                    </div>
                  </li>
                ))}
              </ul>
            </div>
          </main>
        } />
        <Route path="/expenses-chart" element={<ExpensesChartPage expenses={expenses} isDarkTheme={isDarkTheme} />} />
      </Routes>
    </div>
  );
};

export default App;
```

```tsx
                      >

                      </button>
                    </div>
                  </li>
                ))}
              </ul>
            </div>
          </main>
        } />
        <Route path="/expenses-chart" element={<ExpensesChartPage expenses={expenses} isDarkTheme={isDarkTheme} />} />
```

```typescript
// src/react-csv.d.ts
declare module 'react-csv' {

    filename?: string;
    className?: string;
    target?: string;
    children?: React.ReactNode;
  }

  export class CSVLink extends React.Component<CSVLinkProps> {}

  export const CSVDownload: React.ComponentType<any>;
}
```

```tsx
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Route, Routes, Link } from 'react-router-dom';
import { Sun, Moon, Trash, Download } from 'lucide-react';
import { CSVLink } from 'react-csv';
import ExpensesChartPage from './components/ExpensesChartPage';
import BudgetSummary from './components/BudgetSummary';
import WishlistPage from './components/WishlistPage'; // Import the WishlistPage component

interface IncomeItem {
  description: string;
  amount: number;
}

interface ExpenseItem {
  description: string;
  amount: number;
  date: string;
}

const App: React.FC = () => {
  const [incomeCategories, setIncomeCategories] = useState<string[]>(['Salaire net', 'Primes', "Prime d'activité", 'Freelance', 'Investissements']);
  const [expenseCategories, setExpenseCategories] = useState<string[]>(['Loyer', 'Courses', 'Transport', 'Loisirs', 'Santé']);
  const [income, setIncome] = useState<IncomeItem[]>([]);
  const [expenses, setExpenses] = useState<ExpenseItem[]>([]);
  const [newIncome, setNewIncome] = useState<{ description: string; amount: string }>({ description: '', amount: '' });
  const [newExpense, setNewExpense] = useState<{ description: string; amount: string; date: string }>({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
  const [newCategory, setNewCategory] = useState<string>('');
  const [isDarkTheme, setIsDarkTheme] = useState<boolean>(false);

  const toggleTheme = () => setIsDarkTheme(!isDarkTheme);

  const totalIncome = income.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.amount, 0);
  const totalExpenses = expenses.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.amount, 0);

  const handleAddIncome = () => {
    if (newIncome.description && newIncome.amount) {
      setIncome([...income, { ...newIncome, amount: Number(newIncome.amount) }]);
      setNewIncome({ description: '', amount: '' });
    }
  };

  const handleAddExpense = () => {
    if (newExpense.description && newExpense.amount && newExpense.date) {
      setExpenses([...expenses, { ...newExpense, amount: Number(newExpense.amount) }]);
      setNewExpense({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
    }
  };

  const handleAddCategory = (type: 'income' | 'expense') => {
    if (newCategory) {
      if (type === 'income') {
        setIncomeCategories([...incomeCategories, newCategory]);
      } else {
        setExpenseCategories([...expenseCategories, newCategory]);
      }
      setNewCategory('');
    }
  };

  const csvHeaders = [
    { label: 'Description', key: 'description' },
    { label: 'Amount', key: 'amount' },
    { label: 'Date', key: 'date' }
  ];

  return (
    <div className={`min-h-screen ${isDarkTheme ? 'bg-gray-900 text-white' : 'bg-gray-100 text-black'}`}>
      <header className="bg-indigo-600 text-white p-4 flex justify-between items-center">
        <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold">Budget App</h1>
        <nav>
          <Link to="/" className="mr-4">Home</Link>
          <Link to="/expenses-chart" className="mr-4">Répartition des dépenses</Link>
          <Link to="/wishlist" className="mr-4">Wishlist</Link> {/* Add Wishlist link */}
        </nav>
        {isDarkTheme ? (
          <Sun className="cursor-pointer" onClick={toggleTheme} />
        ) : (
          <Moon className="cursor-pointer" onClick={toggleTheme} />
        )}
      </header>

      <Routes>
        <Route path="/" element={
          <main className="container mx-auto p-4">
            <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4">
              <div className="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow">
                <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Entrées d'argent</h2>
                <div className="flex flex-col space-y-2">
                  <select
                    value={newIncome.description}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewIncome({...newIncome, description: e.target.value})}
                    className="p-2 border rounded"
                  >
                    <option value="">Sélectionner une catégorie</option>
                    {incomeCategories.map((category, index) => (
                      <option key={index} value={category}>{category}</option>
                    ))}
                  </select>
                  <input
                    type="number"
                    value={newIncome.amount}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewIncome({...newIncome, amount: e.target.value})}
                    placeholder="Montant"
                    className="p-2 border rounded"
                  />
                  <button onClick={handleAddIncome} className="bg-blue-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded">+ Ajouter</button>
                </div>
                <div className="mt-2">
                  <input
                    type="text"
                    value={newCategory}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewCategory(e.target.value)}
                    placeholder="Nouvelle catégorie"
                    className="p-2 border rounded mr-2"
                  />
                  <button onClick={() => handleAddCategory('income')} className="bg-green-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded">+ Catégorie</button>
                </div>
              </div>

              <div className="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow">
                <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Ajouter une dépense</h2>
                <div className="flex flex-col space-y-2">
                  <select
                    value={newExpense.description}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({...newExpense, description: e.target.value})}
                    className="p-2 border rounded"
                  >
                    <option value="">Sélectionner une catégorie</option>
                    {expenseCategories.map((category, index) => (
                      <option key={index} value={category}>{category}</option>
                    ))}
                  </select>
                  <input
                    type="number"
                    value={newExpense.amount}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({...newExpense, amount: e.target.value})}
                    placeholder="Montant"
                    className="p-2 border rounded"
                  />
                  <input
                    type="date"
                    value={newExpense.date}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({...newExpense, date: e.target.value})}
                    className="p-2 border rounded"
                  />
                  <button onClick={handleAddExpense} className="bg-red-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded">+ Ajouter</button>
                </div>
                <div className="mt-2">
                  <input
                    type="text"
                    value={newCategory}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewCategory(e.target.value)}
                    placeholder="Nouvelle catégorie"
                    className="p-2 border rounded mr-2"
                  />
                  <button onClick={() => handleAddCategory('expense')} className="bg-green-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded">+ Catégorie</button>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>

            {/* Budget Summary */}
            <div className="container mx-auto mt-8">
              <BudgetSummary totalIncome={totalIncome} totalExpenses={totalExpenses} />
            </div>

            <div className="mt-8">
              <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Sorties d'argent</h2>
              <div className="flex justify-between items-center mb-4">
                <input
                  type="text"
                  placeholder="Rechercher des dépenses..."
                  className="w-full p-2 border rounded"
                  // You can add functionality to filter expenses here
                />
                <CSVLink
                  data={expenses}
                  headers={csvHeaders}
                  filename="expenses.csv"
                  className="ml-4 text-blue-500 hover:text-blue-700"
                >
                  <Download className="w-6 h-6" />
                </CSVLink>
              </div>
              <ul>
                {expenses.map((expense, index) => (
                  <li
                    key={index}
                    className="flex justify-between items-center border-b py-2"
                  >
                    <div>
                      <span className="font-semibold">{expense.description}</span>
                      <span className="text-gray-500 ml-2">{expense.date}</span>
                    </div>
                    <div className="flex items-center">
                      <span className="text-red-500">{expense.amount} €</span>
                      <button
                        onClick={() => {
                          const updatedExpenses = expenses.filter((_, i) => i !== index);
                          setExpenses(updatedExpenses);
                        }}
                        className="ml-4 text-red-500 hover:text-red-700"
                      >
                        <Trash className="w-6 h-6" />
                      </button>
                    </div>
                  </li>
                ))}
              </ul>
            </div>
          </main>
        } />
        <Route path="/expenses-chart" element={<ExpensesChartPage expenses={expenses} isDarkTheme={isDarkTheme} />} />
        <Route path="/wishlist" element={<WishlistPage />} /> {/* Add Wishlist route */}
      </Routes>
    </div>
  );
};

export default App;
```

GitHub Copilot: Git does not provide a direct command to list the history of files, folders, or pages created along with their commit status and timestamps. However, you can use a combination of Git commands to achieve this.

### Step-by-Step Process

1. **List the Commit History**:
    ```bash
    git log --name-status --pretty=format:"%h %ad %s" --date=short
    ```

    This command will show the commit hash, date, and commit message along with the names and statuses of the files changed in each commit.

2. **Filter for Specific File or Folder**:
    If you want to filter the history for a specific file or folder, you can use:
    ```bash
    git log --name-status --pretty=format:"%h %ad %s" --date=short -- path/to/file_or_folder
    ```

3. **Check the Status of Uncommitted Changes**:
    ```bash
    git status
    ```

    This command will show you the current status of your working directory, including any uncommitted changes.

GitHub Copilot: Here are some functionalities that could enhance the Budget App:

### 1. **User Authentication**
   - **Login/Signup**: Allow users to create accounts and log in.
   - **OAuth Integration**: Integrate with third-party services like Google or Facebook for authentication.

### 2. **Data Visualization**
   - **Charts and Graphs**: Use libraries like Chart.js or D3.js to visualize income and expenses.
   - **Monthly/Yearly Reports**: Generate reports for different time periods.

### 3. **Expense Categorization**
   - **Custom Categories**: Allow users to create custom categories for income and expenses.
   - **Subcategories**: Add support for subcategories to better organize expenses.

### 4. **Budget Planning**
   - **Budget Goals**: Allow users to set monthly or yearly budget goals.
   - **Alerts and Notifications**: Notify users when they are close to exceeding their budget.

### 5. **Recurring Transactions**
   - **Scheduled Transactions**: Support for recurring income and expenses (e.g., monthly rent, salary).
   - **Reminders**: Send reminders for upcoming transactions.

### 6. **Multi-Currency Support**
   - **Currency Conversion**: Allow users to manage income and expenses in different currencies.
   - **Exchange Rates**: Automatically update exchange rates.

### 7. **Export and Import Data**
   - **Export to CSV/Excel**: Allow users to export their data.
   - **Import from CSV/Excel**: Allow users to import data from other sources.

### 8. **Mobile Responsiveness**
   - **Responsive Design**: Ensure the app is fully responsive and works well on mobile devices.
   - **Mobile App**: Develop a mobile app version for iOS and Android.

### 9. **Dark Mode**
   - **Theme Toggle**: Allow users to switch between light and dark themes.

### 10. **Expense Sharing**
   - **Shared Expenses**: Allow users to share expenses with other users (e.g., roommates).
   - **Split Bills**: Feature to split bills among multiple users.

### 11. **Search and Filter**
   - **Advanced Search**: Allow users to search for specific transactions.
   - **Filter Options**: Provide various filters (e.g., by date, category, amount).

### 12. **Analytics and Insights**
   - **Spending Trends**: Show trends and insights based on spending habits.
   - **Savings Tracker**: Track savings over time.

### 13. **Localization**
   - **Multi-Language Support**: Support for multiple languages.

### 14. **Security**
   - **Two-Factor Authentication**: Add an extra layer of security.
   - **Data Encryption**: Ensure that user data is encrypted.

### 15. **Integration with Banks**
   - **Bank Sync**: Integrate with banks to automatically import transactions.
   - **API Integration**: Use APIs to fetch real-time data from financial institutions.

### 16. **Expense Tags**
   - **Tagging System**: Allow users to tag expenses for better organization.

### 17. **Customizable Dashboard**
   - **Widgets**: Allow users to add/remove widgets on their dashboard.
   - **Personalization**: Customize the layout and appearance of the dashboard.

### 18. **Voice Commands**
   - **Voice Input**: Allow users to add transactions using voice commands.

### 19. **AI-Powered Insights**
   - **Predictive Analysis**: Use AI to predict future expenses and income.
   - **Personalized Tips**: Provide personalized financial tips based on user data.

### 20. **Gamification**
   - **Achievements and Badges**: Reward users for reaching financial goals.
   - **Leaderboards**: Compare spending habits with friends or the community.

Implementing these functionalities can significantly enhance the user experience and make the Budget App more powerful and user-friendly.

```tsx
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Route, Routes, Link } from 'react-router-dom';
import { Sun, Moon, Trash, Download } from 'lucide-react';
import { CSVLink } from 'react-csv';
import ExpensesChartPage from './components/ExpensesChartPage';
import BudgetSummary from './components/BudgetSummary';
import WishlistPage from './components/WishlistPage';
interface IncomeItem {
  description: string;
  amount: number;
}
interface ExpenseItem {
  description: string;
  amount: number;
  date: string;
}
const App: React.FC = () => {
  const [incomeCategories, setIncomeCategories] = useState<string[]>(['Salaire net', 'Primes', "Prime d'activité", 'Freelance', 'Investissements']);
  const [expenseCategories, setExpenseCategories] = useState<string[]>(['Loyer', 'Courses', 'Transport', 'Loisirs', 'Santé']);
  const [income, setIncome] = useState<IncomeItem[]>([]);
  const [expenses, setExpenses] = useState<ExpenseItem[]>([]);
  const [newIncome, setNewIncome] = useState<{ description: string; amount: string }>({ description: '', amount: '' });
  const [newExpense, setNewExpense] = useState<{ description: string; amount: string; date: string }>({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
  const [newCategory, setNewCategory] = useState<string>('');
  const [isDarkTheme, setIsDarkTheme] = useState<boolean>(false);
  const toggleTheme = () => setIsDarkTheme(!isDarkTheme);
  const totalIncome = income.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.amount, 0);
  const totalExpenses = expenses.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.amount, 0);
  const handleAddIncome = () => {
    if (newIncome.description && newIncome.amount) {
      setIncome([...income, { ...newIncome, amount: Number(newIncome.amount) }]);
      setNewIncome({ description: '', amount: '' });
    }
  };
  const handleAddExpense = () => {
    if (newExpense.description && newExpense.amount && newExpense.date) {
      setExpenses([...expenses, { ...newExpense, amount: Number(newExpense.amount) }]);
      setNewExpense({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
    }
  };
  const handleAddCategory = (type: 'income' | 'expense') => {
    if (newCategory) {
      if (type === 'income') {
        setIncomeCategories([...incomeCategories, newCategory]);
      } else {
        setExpenseCategories([...expenseCategories, newCategory]);
      }
      setNewCategory('');
    }
  };
  const csvHeaders = [
    { label: 'Description', key: 'description' },
    { label: 'Amount', key: 'amount' },
    { label: 'Date', key: 'date' }
  ];
  return (
    <div className={`min-h-screen ${isDarkTheme ? 'bg-gray-900 text-white' : 'bg-gray-100 text-black'}`}>
      <header className="bg-indigo-600 text-white p-4 flex justify-between items-center">
        <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold">Budget App</h1>
        <nav>
          <Link to="/" className="mr-4">Home</Link>
          <Link to="/expenses-chart">Répartition des dépenses</Link>
          <Link to="/wishlist" className="ml-4">Wishlist</Link>
        </nav>
        {isDarkTheme ? (
          <Sun className="cursor-pointer" onClick={toggleTheme} />
        ) : (
          <Moon className="cursor-pointer" onClick={toggleTheme} />
        )}
      </header>
      <Routes>
        <Route path="/" element={
          <main className="container mx-auto p-4">
            <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4">
              <div className="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow">
                <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Entrées d'argent</h2>
                <div className="flex flex-col space-y-2">
                  <select
                    value={newIncome.description}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewIncome({...newIncome, description: e.target.value})}
                    className="p-2 border rounded"
                  >
                    <option value="">Sélectionner une catégorie</option>
                    {incomeCategories.map((category, index) => (
                      <option key={index} value={category}>{category}</option>
                    ))}
                  </select>
                  <input
                    type="number"
                    value={newIncome.amount}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewIncome({...newIncome, amount: e.target.value})}
                    placeholder="Montant"
                    className="p-2 border rounded"
                  />
                  <button onClick={handleAddIncome} className="bg-blue-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded">+ Ajouter</button>
                </div>
                <div className="mt-2">
                  <input
                    type="text"
                    value={newCategory}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewCategory(e.target.value)}
                    placeholder="Nouvelle catégorie"
                    className="p-2 border rounded mr-2"
                  />
                  <button onClick={() => handleAddCategory('income')} className="bg-green-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded">+ Catégorie</button>
                </div>
              </div>
              <div className="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow">
                <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Ajouter une dépense</h2>
                <div className="flex flex-col space-y-2">
                  <select
                    value={newExpense.description}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({...newExpense, description: e.target.value})}
                    className="p-2 border rounded"
                  >
                    <option value="">Sélectionner une catégorie</option>
                    {expenseCategories.map((category, index) => (
                      <option key={index} value={category}>{category}</option>
                    ))}
                  </select>
                  <input
                    type="number"
                    value={newExpense.amount}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({...newExpense, amount: e.target.value})}
                    placeholder="Montant"
                    className="p-2 border rounded"
                  />
                  <input
                    type="date"
                    value={newExpense.date}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({...newExpense, date: e.target.value})}
                    className="p-2 border rounded"
                  />
                  <button onClick={handleAddExpense} className="bg-red-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded">+ Ajouter</button>
                </div>
                <div className="mt-2">
                  <input
                    type="text"
                    value={newCategory}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewCategory(e.target.value)}
                    placeholder="Nouvelle catégorie"
                    className="p-2 border rounded mr-2"
                  />
                  <button onClick={() => handleAddCategory('expense')} className="bg-green-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded">+ Catégorie</button>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
            {/* Budget Summary */}
            <div className="container mx-auto mt-8">
              <BudgetSummary totalIncome={totalIncome} totalExpenses={totalExpenses} />
            </div>
            <div className="mt-8">
              <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Sorties d'argent</h2>
              <div className="flex justify-between items-center mb-4">
                <input
                  type="text"
                  placeholder="Rechercher des dépenses..."
                  className="w-full p-2 border rounded"
                  // You can add functionality to filter expenses here
                />
                <CSVLink
                  data={expenses}
                  headers={csvHeaders}
                  filename="expenses.csv"
                  className="ml-4 text-blue-500 hover:text-blue-700"
                >
                  <Download className="w-6 h-6" />
                </CSVLink>
              </div>
              <ul>
                {expenses.map((expense, index) => (
                  <li
                    key={index}
                    className="flex justify-between items-center border-b py-2"
                  >
                    <div>
                      <span className="font-semibold">{expense.description}</span>
                      <span className="text-gray-500 ml-2">{expense.date}</span>
                    </div>
                    <div className="flex items-center">
                      <span className="text-red-500">{expense.amount} €</span>
                      <button
                        onClick={() => {
                          const updatedExpenses = expenses.filter((_, i) => i !== index);
                          setExpenses(updatedExpenses);
                        }}
                        className="ml-4 text-red-500 hover:text-red-700"
                      >
                        <Trash className="w-6 h-6" />
                      </button>
                    </div>
                  </li>
                ))}
              </ul>
            </div>
          </main>
        } />
        <Route path="/expenses-chart" element={<ExpensesChartPage expenses={expenses} isDarkTheme={isDarkTheme} />} />
        <Route path="/wishlist" element={<WishlistPage />} />
      </Routes>
    </div>
  );
};
export default App;
```

GitHub Copilot: Yes, the `-u` flag (short for `--set-upstream`) is useful when you want to set the upstream branch for the current local branch. This is typically done the first time you push a new branch to the remote repository. After setting the upstream branch, you can simply use `git push` and `git pull` without specifying the remote and branch name.

Here are the commands with the `-u` flag:

1. **Stage the changes**:
   ```sh
   git add .github/workflows/gh-pages.yml
   ```

2. **Commit the changes**:
   ```sh
   git commit -m "Update GitHub Actions workflow to include new-feature branch"
   ```

3. **Push the changes to the `new-feature` branch with upstream tracking**:
   ```sh
   git push -u origin new-feature
   ```

Using the `-u` flag sets the `new-feature` branch as the upstream branch for your local branch, making future pushes and pulls easier.

Terminal: The error message indicates that you have local changes that would be overwritten by the checkout. To resolve this, you can either commit your changes, stash them, or discard them if they are not needed.

Here are the steps you can take:

1. **Stash Your Changes**:
    ```bash
    git stash
    ```

    This command will save your local changes and allow you to switch branches. After switching branches, you can apply the stashed changes if needed using:
    ```bash
    git stash apply
    ```

2. **Commit Your Changes**:
    If you want to keep the changes, you can commit them:
    ```bash
    git add .
    git commit -m "Save progress on new-feature"
    ```

3. **Discard Your Changes**:
    If the changes are not needed, you can discard them:
    ```bash
    git checkout -- client/node_modules/.cache/default-development/0.pack
    git checkout -- client/node_modules/.cache/default-development/index.pack
    git checkout -- client/node_modules/.cache/default-development/index.pack.old
    git checkout -- client/node_modules/.cache/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
    ```

After performing one of these actions, you should be able to switch to the `main` branch:
```bash
git checkout main
```

interface IncomeExpenseFormProps {

  handleAddCategory: (type: string) => void;
  newCategory: string;
  setNewCategory: React.Dispatch<React.SetStateAction<string>>;
  isIncome: boolean;
}

const IncomeExpenseForm: React.FC<IncomeExpenseFormProps> = ({
  categories,

  setNewItem,
  handleAddItem,
  handleAddCategory,
  newCategory,
  setNewCategory,
  isIncome,
}) => {
  return (
    <div className="bg-gray-800 p-4 rounded-lg shadow">
      <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">{isIncome ? "Entrées d'argent" : 'Ajouter une dépense'}</h2>

        <select
          value={newItem.description}
          onChange={(e) => setNewItem({ ...newItem, description: e.target.value })}
          className="p-2 border rounded bg-gray-700 text-white"
        >
          <option value="">Sélectionner une catégorie</option>
          {categories.map((category, index) => (
            <option key={index} value={category}>
              {category}
            </option>
          ))}
        </select>
        <input
          type="number"
          value={newItem.amount}
          onChange={(e) => setNewItem({ ...newItem, amount: e.target.value })}
          placeholder="Montant"
          className="p-2 border rounded bg-gray-700 text-white"
        />
        {!isIncome && (
          <input
            type="date"
            value={newItem.date}
            onChange={(e) => setNewItem({ ...newItem, date: e.target.value })}
            className="p-2 border rounded bg-gray-700 text-white"
          />
        )}
        <button
          onClick={handleAddItem}
          className={`${
            isIncome ? 'bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700' : 'bg-red-600 hover:bg-red-700'
          } text-white px-4 py-2 rounded`}
        >
          + Ajouter
        </button>
      </div>
      <div className="mt-2">
        <input
          type="text"
          value={newCategory}
          onChange={(e) => setNewCategory(e.target.value)}
          placeholder="Nouvelle catégorie"
          className="p-2 border rounded mr-2 bg-gray-700 text-white"
        />
        <button
          onClick={() => handleAddCategory(isIncome ? 'income' : 'expense')}
          className="bg-green-600 hover:bg-green-700 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded"
        >
          + Catégorie
        </button>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};

export default IncomeExpenseForm;

```tsx
  date: string;

  const [income, setIncome] = useState<IncomeItem[]>([]);
  const [expenses, setExpenses] = useState<ExpenseItem[]>([]);
  const [newIncome, setNewIncome] = useState<{ description: string; amount: string }>({ description: '', amount: '' });
  const [newExpense, setNewExpense] = useState<{ description: string; amount: string; date: string }>({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
  const [newCategory, setNewCategory] = useState<string>('');
  const [isDarkTheme, setIsDarkTheme] = useState<boolean>(false);

  const totalExpenses = expenses.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.amount, 0);

  const handleAddIncome = () => {
    if (newIncome.description && newIncome.amount) {
      setIncome([...income, { ...newIncome, amount: Number(newIncome.amount) }]);
      setNewIncome({ description: '', amount: '' });
    }
  };

  const handleAddExpense = () => {
    if (newExpense.description && newExpense.amount && newExpense.date) {
      setExpenses([...expenses, { ...newExpense, amount: Number(newExpense.amount) }]);
      setNewExpense({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
    }

      }
      setNewCategory('');
```

Here is the complete code for the [`WishlistPage`](command:_github.copilot.openSymbolFromReferences?%5B%22%22%2C%5B%7B%22uri%22%3A%7B%22scheme%22%3A%22file%22%2C%22authority%22%3A%22%22%2C%22path%22%3A%22%2FUsers%2Fjuleseulalie%2Fthe-budget-app%2Fclient%2Fsrc%2FApp.tsx%22%2C%22query%22%3A%22%22%2C%22fragment%22%3A%22%22%7D%2C%22pos%22%3A%7B%22line%22%3A6%2C%22character%22%3A7%7D%7D%5D%2C%22c0b44a3a-e48d-42cf-aacb-9ecbde770121%22%5D "Go to definition") component with the added functionalities:

```tsx
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Trash } from 'lucide-react';

interface WishlistItem {
  description: string;
  purchased: boolean;
}

const WishlistPage: React.FC = () => {
  const [wishlist, setWishlist] = useState<WishlistItem[]>([]);
  const [newItem, setNewItem] = useState<string>('');

  const handleAddItem = () => {
    if (newItem) {
      setWishlist([...wishlist, { description: newItem, purchased: false }]);
      setNewItem('');
    }
  };

  const handleRemoveItem = (index: number) => {
    const updatedWishlist = wishlist.filter((_, i) => i !== index);
    setWishlist(updatedWishlist);
  };

  const handleTogglePurchased = (index: number) => {
    const updatedWishlist = wishlist.map((item, i) =>
      i === index ? { ...item, purchased: !item.purchased } : item
    );
    setWishlist(updatedWishlist);
  };

  return (
    <div className="container mx-auto p-4">
      <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Wishlist</h2>
      <div className="flex mb-4">
        <input
          type="text"
          value={newItem}
          onChange={(e) => setNewItem(e.target.value)}
          placeholder="Nouvel article"
          className="p-2 border rounded mr-2"
        />
        <button onClick={handleAddItem} className="bg-green-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded hover:bg-green-700">
          + Ajouter
        </button>
      </div>
      <ul>
        {wishlist.map((item, index) => (
          <li
            key={index}
            className={`flex justify-between items-center border-b py-2 ${item.purchased ? 'line-through text-gray-500' : ''}`}
          >
            <div className="flex items-center">
              <input
                type="checkbox"
                checked={item.purchased}
                onChange={() => handleTogglePurchased(index)}
                className="mr-2"
              />
              <span>{item.description}</span>
            </div>
            <button
              onClick={() => handleRemoveItem(index)}
              className="ml-4 text-red-500 hover:text-red-700"
            >
              <Trash className="w-6 h-6" />
            </button>
          </li>
        ))}
      </ul>
    </div>
  );
};

export default WishlistPage;
```

### Summary of Functionalities

1. **Add Items**:
    - An input field and a button to add new items to the wishlist.

2. **Remove Items**:
    - A button to remove items from the wishlist.

3. **Mark Items as Purchased**:
    - A checkbox to mark items as purchased, which will strike through the item description.

### Integration in [`App.tsx`](command:_github.copilot.openRelativePath?%5B%7B%22scheme%22%3A%22file%22%2C%22authority%22%3A%22%22%2C%22path%22%3A%22%2FUsers%2Fjuleseulalie%2Fthe-budget-app%2Fclient%2Fsrc%2FApp.tsx%22%2C%22query%22%3A%22%22%2C%22fragment%22%3A%22%22%7D%2C%22c0b44a3a-e48d-42cf-aacb-9ecbde770121%22%5D "/Users/juleseulalie/the-budget-app/client/src/App.tsx")

```tsx
import ExpensesChartPage from './components/ExpensesChartPage';
import BudgetSummary from './components/BudgetSummary';
import WishlistPage from './components/WishlistPage';

interface IncomeItem {
  description: string;
  amount: number;
}

interface ExpenseItem {
  description: string;
  amount: number;
  date: string;
}

const App: React.FC = () => {
  const [incomeCategories, setIncomeCategories] = useState<string[]>(['Salaire net', 'Primes', "Prime d'activité", 'Freelance', 'Investissements']);
  const [expenseCategories, setExpenseCategories] = useState<string[]>(['Loyer', 'Courses', 'Transport', 'Loisirs', 'Santé']);
  const [income, setIncome] = useState<IncomeItem[]>([]);
  const [expenses, setExpenses] = useState<ExpenseItem[]>([]);
  const [newIncome, setNewIncome] = useState<{ description: string; amount: string }>({ description: '', amount: '' });
  const [newExpense, setNewExpense] = useState<{ description: string; amount: string; date: string }>({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
  const [newCategory, setNewCategory] = useState<string>('');
  const [isDarkTheme, setIsDarkTheme] = useState<boolean>(false);

  const toggleTheme = () => setIsDarkTheme(!isDarkTheme);

  const totalIncome = income.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.amount, 0);
  const totalExpenses = expenses.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.amount, 0);

  const handleAddIncome = () => {
    if (newIncome.description && newIncome.amount) {
      setIncome([...income, { ...newIncome, amount: Number(newIncome.amount) }]);
      setNewIncome({ description: '', amount: '' });
    }
  };

  const handleAddExpense = () => {
    if (newExpense.description && newExpense.amount && newExpense.date) {
      setExpenses([...expenses, { ...newExpense, amount: Number(newExpense.amount) }]);
      setNewExpense({ description: '', amount: '', date: '' });
    }
  };

  const handleAddCategory = (type: 'income' | 'expense') => {
    if (newCategory) {
      if (type === 'income') {
        setIncomeCategories([...incomeCategories, newCategory]);
      } else {
        setExpenseCategories([...expenseCategories, newCategory]);
      }
      setNewCategory('');
    }
  };

  const csvHeaders = [
    { label: 'Description', key: 'description' },
    { label: 'Amount', key: 'amount' },
    { label: 'Date', key: 'date' }
  ];

  return (
    <div className={`min-h-screen ${isDarkTheme ? 'bg-gray-900 text-white' : 'bg-gray-100 text-black'}`}>
      <header className="bg-indigo-600 text-white p-4 flex justify-between items-center">
        <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold">Budget App</h1>
        <nav>
          <Link to="/" className="mr-4">Home</Link>
          <Link to="/expenses-chart">Expenses</Link>
          <Link to="/wishlist" className="ml-4">Wishlist</Link>
        </nav>
        {isDarkTheme ? (
          <Sun className="cursor-pointer" onClick={toggleTheme} />
        ) : (
          <Moon className="cursor-pointer" onClick={toggleTheme} />
        )}
      </header>

      <Routes>
        <Route path="/" element={
          <main className="container mx-auto p-4">
            <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4">
              <div className={`p-4 rounded-lg shadow ${isDarkTheme ? 'bg-gray-800' : 'bg-gray-200'}`}>
                <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Entrées d'argent</h2>
                <div className="flex flex-col space-y-2">
                  <select
                    value={newIncome.description}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewIncome({...newIncome, description: e.target.value})}
                    className={`p-2 border rounded ${isDarkTheme ? 'bg-gray-700 text-white' : 'bg-gray-100 text-black'}`}
                  >
                    <option value="">Sélectionner une catégorie</option>
                    {incomeCategories.map((category, index) => (
                      <option key={index} value={category}>{category}</option>
                    ))}
                  </select>
                  <input
                    type="number"
                    value={newIncome.amount}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewIncome({...newIncome, amount: e.target.value})}
                    placeholder="Montant"
                    className={`p-2 border rounded ${isDarkTheme ? 'bg-gray-700 text-white' : 'bg-gray-100 text-black'}`}
                  />
                  <button onClick={handleAddIncome} className="bg-blue-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded hover:bg-blue-700">+ Ajouter</button>
                </div>
                <div className="mt-2">
                  <input
                    type="text"
                    value={newCategory}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewCategory(e.target.value)}
                    placeholder="Nouvelle catégorie"
                    className={`p-2 border rounded mr-2 ${isDarkTheme ? 'bg-gray-700 text-white' : 'bg-gray-100 text-black'}`}
                  />
                  <button onClick={() => handleAddCategory('income')} className="bg-green-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded hover:bg-green-700">+ Catégorie</button>
                </div>
              </div>

              <div className={`p-4 rounded-lg shadow ${isDarkTheme ? 'bg-gray-800' : 'bg-gray-200'}`}>
                <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Ajouter une dépense</h2>
                <div className="flex flex-col space-y-2">
                  <select
                    value={newExpense.description}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({...newExpense, description: e.target.value})}
                    className={`p-2 border rounded ${isDarkTheme ? 'bg-gray-700 text-white' : 'bg-gray-100 text-black'}`}
                  >
                    <option value="">Sélectionner une catégorie</option>
                    {expenseCategories.map((category, index) => (
                      <option key={index} value={category}>{category}</option>
                    ))}
                  </select>
                  <input
                    type="number"
                    value={newExpense.amount}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({...newExpense, amount: e.target.value})}
                    placeholder="Montant"
                    className={`p-2 border rounded ${isDarkTheme ? 'bg-gray-700 text-white' : 'bg-gray-100 text-black'}`}
                  />
                  <input
                    type="date"
                    value={newExpense.date}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewExpense({...newExpense, date: e.target.value})}
                    className={`p-2 border rounded ${isDarkTheme ? 'bg-gray-700 text-white' : 'bg-gray-100 text-black'}`}
                  />
                  <button onClick={handleAddExpense} className="bg-red-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded hover:bg-red-700">+ Ajouter</button>
                </div>
                <div className="mt-2">
                  <input
                    type="text"
                    value={newCategory}
                    onChange={(e) => setNewCategory(e.target.value)}
                    placeholder="Nouvelle catégorie"
                    className={`p-2 border rounded mr-2 ${isDarkTheme ? 'bg-gray-700 text-white' : 'bg-gray-100 text-black'}`}
                  />
                  <button onClick={() => handleAddCategory('expense')} className="bg-green-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded hover:bg-green-700">+ Catégorie</button>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>

            {/* Budget Summary */}
            <div className="container mx-auto mt-8">
              <BudgetSummary totalIncome={totalIncome} totalExpenses={totalExpenses} />
            </div>

            <div className="mt-8">
              <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Sorties d'argent</h2>
              <div className="flex justify-between items-center mb-4">
                <input
                  type="text"
                  placeholder="Rechercher des dépenses..."
                  className="w-full p-2 border rounded"
                  // You can add functionality to filter expenses here
                />
                <CSVLink
                  data={expenses}
                  headers={csvHeaders}
                  filename="expenses.csv"
                  className="ml-4 text-blue-500 hover:text-blue-700"
                >
                  <Download className="w-6 h-6" />
                </CSVLink>
              </div>
              <ul>
                {expenses.map((expense, index) => (
                  <li
                    key={index}
                    className="flex justify-between items-center border-b py-2"
                  >
                    <div>
                      <span className="font-semibold">{expense.description}</span>
                      <span className="text-gray-500 ml-2">{expense.date}</span>
                    </div>
                    <div className="flex items-center">
                      <span className="text-red-500">{expense.amount} €</span>
                      <button
                        onClick={() => {
                          const updatedExpenses = expenses.filter((_, i) => i !== index);
                          setExpenses(updatedExpenses);
                        }}
                        className="ml-4 text-red-500 hover:text-red-700"
                      >
                        <Trash className="w-6 h-6" />
                      </button>
                    </div>
                  </li>
                ))}
              </ul>
            </div>
          </main>
        } />
        <Route path="/expenses-chart" element={<ExpensesChartPage expenses={expenses} isDarkTheme={isDarkTheme} />} />
        <Route path="/wishlist" element={<WishlistPage />} />
      </Routes>
    </div>
  );
};

export default App;
```

```tsx
// src/components/WishlistPage.tsx
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Trash } from 'lucide-react';
interface WishlistItem {
  description: string;
  purchased: boolean;
}
const WishlistPage: React.FC = () => {
  const [wishlist, setWishlist] = useState<WishlistItem[]>([]);
  const [newItem, setNewItem] = useState<string>('');
  const handleAddItem = () => {
    if (newItem) {
      setWishlist([...wishlist, { description: newItem, purchased: false }]);
      setNewItem('');
    }
  };
  const handleRemoveItem = (index: number) => {
    const updatedWishlist = wishlist.filter((_, i) => i !== index);
    setWishlist(updatedWishlist);
  };
  const handleTogglePurchased = (index: number) => {
    const updatedWishlist = wishlist.map((item, i) =>
      i === index ? { ...item, purchased: !item.purchased } : item
    );
    setWishlist(updatedWishlist);
  };
  return (
    <div className="container mx-auto p-4">
      <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Wishlist</h2>
      <div className="flex mb-4">
        <input
          type="text"
          value={newItem}
          onChange={(e) => setNewItem(e.target.value)}
          placeholder="Nouvel article"
          className="p-2 border rounded mr-2"
        />
        <button onClick={handleAddItem} className="bg-green-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded hover:bg-green-700">
          + Ajouter
        </button>
      </div>
      <ul>
        {wishlist.map((item, index) => (
          <li
            key={index}
            className={`flex justify-between items-center border-b py-2 ${item.purchased ? 'line-through text-gray-500' : ''}`}
          >
            <div className="flex items-center">
              <input
                type="checkbox"
                checked={item.purchased}
                onChange={() => handleTogglePurchased(index)}
                className="mr-2"
              />
              <span>{item.description}</span>
            </div>
            <button
              onClick={() => handleRemoveItem(index)}
              className="ml-4 text-red-500 hover:text-red-700"
            >
              <Trash className="w-6 h-6" />
            </button>
          </li>
        ))}
      </ul>
    </div>
  );
};
export default WishlistPage;
```

```tsx
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Trash } from 'lucide-react';
import { jsPDF } from 'jspdf';
import html2canvas from 'html2canvas';

interface WishlistItem {
  description: string;
  purchased: boolean;
  price: number;
  picture: string;
  link: string;
}

const WishlistPage: React.FC = () => {
  const [wishlist, setWishlist] = useState<WishlistItem[]>([]);
  const [newItem, setNewItem] = useState<string>('');
  const [newPrice, setNewPrice] = useState<string>('');
  const [newPicture, setNewPicture] = useState<string>('');
  const [newLink, setNewLink] = useState<string>('');

  const handleAddItem = () => {
    if (newItem && newPrice) {
      setWishlist([...wishlist, { description: newItem, purchased: false, price: parseFloat(newPrice), picture: newPicture, link: newLink }]);
      setNewItem('');
      setNewPrice('');
      setNewPicture('');
      setNewLink('');
    }
  };

  const handleRemoveItem = (index: number) => {
    const updatedWishlist = wishlist.filter((_, i) => i !== index);
    setWishlist(updatedWishlist);
  };

  const handleTogglePurchased = (index: number) => {
    const updatedWishlist = wishlist.map((item, i) =>
      i === index ? { ...item, purchased: !item.purchased } : item
    );
    setWishlist(updatedWishlist);
  };

  const calculateTotalPrice = () => {
    return wishlist.reduce((total, item) => total + item.price, 0).toFixed(2);
  };

  const downloadPDF = () => {
    const doc = new jsPDF();
    doc.text('Wishlist', 10, 10);
    wishlist.forEach((item, index) => {
      doc.text(`${index + 1}. ${item.description} - $${item.price}`, 10, 20 + index * 10);
    });
    doc.save('wishlist.pdf');
  };

  const downloadImage = () => {
    html2canvas(document.querySelector("#wishlist")!).then(canvas => {
      const link = document.createElement('a');
      link.download = 'wishlist.png';
      link.href = canvas.toDataURL();
      link.click();
    });
  };

  return (
    <div className="container mx-auto p-4">
      <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Wishlist</h2>
      <div className="flex mb-4">
        <input
          type="text"
          value={newItem}
          onChange={(e) => setNewItem(e.target.value)}
          placeholder="Nouvel article"
          className="p-2 border rounded mr-2"
        />
        <input
          type="number"
          value={newPrice}
          onChange={(e) => setNewPrice(e.target.value)}
          placeholder="Prix"
          className="p-2 border rounded mr-2"
        />
        <input
          type="text"
          value={newPicture}
          onChange={(e) => setNewPicture(e.target.value)}
          placeholder="URL de l'image"
          className="p-2 border rounded mr-2"
        />
        <input
          type="text"
          value={newLink}
          onChange={(e) => setNewLink(e.target.value)}
          placeholder="Lien"
          className="p-2 border rounded mr-2"
        />
        <button onClick={handleAddItem} className="bg-green-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded hover:bg-green-700">
          + Ajouter
        </button>
      </div>
      <ul id="wishlist">
        {wishlist.map((item, index) => (
          <li
            key={index}
            className={`flex justify-between items-center border-b py-2 ${item.purchased ? 'line-through text-gray-500' : ''}`}
          >
            <div className="flex items-center">
              <input
                type="checkbox"
                checked={item.purchased}
                onChange={() => handleTogglePurchased(index)}
                className="mr-2"
              />
              <span>{item.description}</span>
              <span className="ml-4">${item.price.toFixed(2)}</span>
              {item.picture && <img src={item.picture} alt={item.description} className="ml-4 w-10 h-10"

 />}


              {item.link && <a href={item.link} target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" className="ml-4 text-blue-500 hover:underline">Lien</a>}
            </div>
            <button
              onClick={() => handleRemoveItem(index)}
              className="ml-4 text-red-500 hover:text-red-700"
            >
              <Trash className="w-6 h-6" />
            </button>
          </li>
        ))}
      </ul>
      <div className="mt-4">
        <h3 className="text-lg font-semibold">Total: ${calculateTotalPrice()}</h3>
      </div>
      <div className="mt-4">
        <button onClick={downloadPDF} className="bg-blue-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded hover:bg-blue-700 mr-2">
          Télécharger PDF
        </button>
        <button onClick={downloadImage} className="bg-blue-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded hover:bg-blue-700">
          Télécharger Image
        </button>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};

export default WishlistPage;
```
